36543590.review:
Dungeons 3
Приветствую, Сомневающееся-В-Покупке-Данного-Продукта Зло!

   Данная игра представлена полной пародией на современную (и не очень) литературу кинематограф и игровую индустрию в целом, так сказать смесь всего и вся (жанров, фильмов, героев с чересчур похожими именами таких же героев, только с более серьезной стороны лора).
   К Вам, Всеведущему-И-Очень-Самовлюбленному Злу в попечение попадает сомневающаяся в себе темная эльфийка, которая до сих пор не может определиться, за какую она сторону воюет, так сказать, страдающую биполярным расстройством личности, ну как у Голлума. Вся эта вакханалия происходит в жанре RTS и очень похожа на Dungeon Keeper II, как некоторыми комнатами (и персонажами), так и игровым процессом (который упростили, добавив возможность управлять армией с помощью "Выделить всех" и щёлкнув ПКМ на враге).
   В игре, как в сюжете, так и в диалогах, творится неописуемая и очень смешная пародийная сатира на огромное количество персонажей из различных вселенных, которых высмеивают и обыгрывают неплохие актеры озвучки (в игре присутствует русская локализация, которая очень хороша). Очень нравится озвучка рассказчика, почти в каждой фразе которого звучит упрек или забавный намек на Ваши действия (как в DKII), но более живой, чтоли.
Основным огромным плюсом данной игры считаю то, что кампанию можно проходить в режиме кооператива... КООПЕРАТИВ в стратегии, да еще и с забавным сюжетом это очень весомый плюс данной игры.
Шутки, приколы, строительство подземелья, захват верхнего мира, пытки, тюрьмы, орда алкоголиков, религиозная нежить и испорченные девки в латексе с плетками вместе с шутками на WoW (Джойна Параудмур и Долларан) и Neverwinter (Форевервинтер с кучей ролевиков-имбицилов) смешивается с другими вселенными игр и фильмов (Властелин Колец Голлум Пародия на Главную Героиню и Гримли гном расист, собутыльник которого является Талос палладин, который своими речами похож на Утера Светоносного мать его, Дьявол Кроули, да да... бесполезный парень) и получается довольно хорошая и забавная игра про Злого-Захватившего-Пол-Мира-Персонажа Зло. А еще тут есть Кардашь-Шьян, змея одимс словом, Робдауни, который гоблин-инженер-строитель-самоучка и много других имен, переиначеных и забавных. Огр Промиллио, который любит бухать и петь...
   Некоторые моменты, конечно же, смущают. К примеру отсутствие в игре опций для настройки графики (что поправимо с помощью стороннего ПО от Nvidia, если у Вас Nvidia). Игра не оптимизирована для ноутбуков, fps был залочен на 30 fps (что я конечно же исправил сам). Были еще небольшие проблемы с рассинхронизацией в Кооперативной игре, иногда пропадал звук в бесконечном режиме, что исправлялось только перезагрузкой игры, но это так, мелочи, технические недостатки и просчеты разработчиков, не столь важно для меня.
Смешно, красиво, кооператив, рандомно генерирующиеся карты для бесконечной игры в соло или с другом, крутая кампания, куча отсылок (на которых практически и стоит сюжет) и всё это завернуто в неплохую графику с хорошей звуковой составляющей (локализация на высоте). Сплошное удовольствие от игры, которое я так давно уже не получал.

   Стоимость у игры относительная. Если Вы ищете что-нибудь трудное и серьезное, с возможностью продемонстрировать свои игровые навыки и посоревноваться с другими игроками - Вам мимо, и она для Вас будет лишней и неинтересной. Ну а если же хочется расслабиться и просто повтыкать в монитор, весело провести время с другом и послушать смешной рассказ пародийной истории, иногда отвлекаясь на строительство и укрепление своего подземелья, Вам она подойдет. Брать можно как по скидке, так и за полную цену, игра довольно долгая и времяпоглощающая, невозможно пройти её за 2 часа и оформить возврат средств.

Если Вам понравился обзор, вступайте в мою группу http://steamcommunity.com/groups/RrrUST и Вы всегда будете знать, когда выходит новый!

Удачи тебе, Менее-Сомневающееся-В-Покупке-Данного-Продукта Зло!

36520728.review:
Coop ist leider null ausgereift und es gibst auch keine Lösungen dafür online.

Hab es mit einem Freund gemeinsam gehollt und nach dem ersten 5 min war der erste bug schon gefunden. Nach 2 Tagen an versuchen wurde es nur noch schlimmer. Der host hat kaum Probleme, aber der der beitritt fast immer. 

Standart bugs:

- Bei 5 von 6 versuchen bleibt das Spiel bei 50%,95% hängen und geht nicht weiter. (bei 95% manchmal nach 5-15 min erst weiter)

Die bugs des beigetrettenen Spielers:

- Ruckler/Laggs
- Spiel bleibt stehen und versucht einzuhollen was oft nicht klappt
- durch Laggs kann man Felder bauen die nie Fertig werden und für immer da sind (Gnomme bebauen sie immer wieder GG)
- Sachen die man aufhebt kann man nicht mehr fallen lassen
- Filmsequenzen werden nicht angezeigt
- Nach dem durchspielen bleibt es hängen und man bekommt nicht die nächste Mission freigeschaltet (bei mir habe ich Mission 7 und 9, aber 8 nicht trotz erfolge )

Ohne firewall, ohne antivirus, mit adminrechten, neuste treiber und mit portforward, keine verbesserung ....

36520688.review: I like the game a lot. I DO! I wish I could decide when and where I dig to the surface. This last mission had 3 entry points to defend at the begining, with 2 paths to the heart. I worked around it, tunneling around the edges and filling it in. I like the creativity creating paths allows me. I wish there was a pause button for planning the cave some. I don't like how enemies get progressively tougher, it makes me feel in a rush. I really like the dungeon and resource production system. I sometimes feel that defense isn't as set and forget as I would like, I usually am teleporting my whole team back to defend a rush, then trying to sort out my attack squad again when teleporting back. I dont know if there is a squad selection yet (that is not f2) I haven't found it and it wasn't in the tutorial. The overworld is a mechanic that helps push the game along, but I'm not in love with it. I setup a squad of 3-4 healers, some damage guys and just slowly crawl over the space killing groups in slower and slower fashion, as the enemies keep getting tougher. I wish the over world was a little more strategic, like storming something similar to a dungeon\ but instead its a castle. Maybe tier the system like a siege, first attack coutnry side, then town, then layers of the keep. Each giving more of the research energy you need. Just a thought, there has to be something more interesting than watching my 10 orcs slowly mash 5 "good" guys, heal, and repeat.

36497915.review:
Dungeons 3 ist wie die Vorgänger sehr gut zu spielen. Ich hatte sofort wieder das alte Dungeon Keeper Gefühl und es war gut mal wieder richtig böse zu sein. Die Grafik ist  gut und die Steuerung geht gut von der Hand. Die neuen Titaneneinheiten ( Oger, Grubenlord und Grabgolem ) bringen mit ihren Fähigkeiten ordentlich Chaos aufs Schlachtfeld. Mit Talyia schickt der Spieler eine ebenfalls mächtige Einheit ins Feld. Ihre Feuerbälle und Schattendiener machen schnell kurzen Prozess mit dem Gegner.  Die Kampange unterhält wieder mit einer guten Story und einemnoch besseren Erzähler.

Persönlich fehlen mir aber ein paar Sachen aus dem Vorgänger. Als Beispiel war es möglich aus z.B einem Orc ( Basiseinheit) zu einem Eisenpelz ( Tank ) oder einem Berserker zu machen. Dies erlaubte eine taktischere Armeenplanung, was leider nun auf eine Aufwertung für Orcs und Goblin zurückgefahren wurde. Auch ist das Ende etwas enttäuschend, da es offen ist, aber ich denke das Dungeons 3 mit weiteren DLCs ausgebaut wird.


Abgesehen von meinen persönlichen Kritikpunkten kann ich nur sagen :
Alles im allen ist es ein gutes Spiel. Ich kann es jedem Freund solcher Spiele empfehlen.

36489044.review:
Я очень любил Dungeons 2. Dungeons 3 же сделали огромный шаг вперед для серии! Сохранив дух и привлекательность предыдущей части, разработчики привнесли и очень много нового, сделали огромную работу над ошибками. Постараюсь описать кратко и по пунктам:

Плюсы:
+ Все лагеря - орда, нежить, демоны - теперь строятся в одном подземелье! Не надо выбирать, за кого же сыграть. Все и сразу в одном флаконе. Реализовано здорово!
+ Сюжет - он стал значительно больше, чем в предыдущей части. Юмора - море! Миссии действительно разнообразные, с необычными условиями. К каждой миссии так же есть по две дополнительных необязательных задачи, усложняющих прохождение. А для тех, кому слишком легко, добавили кнопку "адская сложность".
+ Комментатор - он был великолепен во второй части. В третьей части же разработчики уделили ему ОГРОМНУЮ роль. Голос за кадром будет радовать и смешить в течение всей игры, вклиниваться в сюжет, перебивать героев и жечь! И да, в нашей озвучке работает тот же актер, что и во второй части. Гениально! Браво!
+ Кнопки F2, F3, F4! Господи, наконец-то добавили возможность взять в руку сразу ВСЕХ юнитов и так же моментально сразу всех сбросить на голову противнику! Как же этого не хватало!
+ курсор - теперь он маленький, аккуратненький, а рука Абсолютного Зла лишь послушно летает за ним. Попадать в цели стало гораздо легче
+ геймплей - стал еще сбалансированнее, интереснее, продуманнее. Например, сопляков (читай: батраков) отделили от войск, теперь для них есть свои единицы условного "питания". Не надо выбирать, нанять еще войск или сопляков. Интересное решение! Ну и в целом развитие базы, умений, улучшений, персонажей теперь стало более продвинутым, логичным, интересным.
+ стабильность - в сравнении со второй частью игра стала куда стабильнее, не вылетела ни разу!
+ юмор - и еще раз юмор! Господи, он потрясающий. Стебут все на свете, начиная с властелина колец и заканчивая Warcraft, игрой престолов и другими популярными вещами.
+ герои - добавление полноценных героев со своей индивидуальностью, абилками и тараканами в голове.

Минусы:
- При частом использовании Alt-Tab может выключиться звук. Помогает перезапуск игры.
- Весь прогресс, достигнутый по сюжету в той или иной миссии, в начале следующей сбрасывается. Порой бывает обидно. :)

Как видите, минусы незначительны, их мало. Зато плюсов - море! Я могу очень долго говорить о том, насколько великолепна эта игра. Очень советую купить и пройти, но начать советую все же с Dungeons II, затем пройти потрясающее, ГЕНИАЛЬНОЕ DLC: A Game of Winter, а затем перейти к третьей части.
Одна из лучших серий последних лет! Спасибо разработчикам! 11/10! Браво!

36486839.review:
原文发布在奶牛关，如果想看带图版的话请点击链接：
https://cowlevel.net/game/Dungeons_3/review/2827514

首先要感谢开发者提供的Key，我有确实地享受到游戏的乐趣，十分感谢。

作为一款系列作，总归是会拿去和前作进行比较的。只是从这点上来看的话，《地下城3》或许进步并不是很大，看起来更多的是作为《地下城2》的加强版，在各方面都有了一定的提升之后的产物，而说到《地下城2》，或许难免不让人想到这就是《地下城守护者（Dungeon Keeper）》的全面进化版。但是也不得不说，因为这个游戏题材本身就已经是被开发到足够高的完成度了，所以在创新玩法的方面没有较大的差别想来也是可以理解的。

对比前作，从第一印象上来看最直观的差异就是美术风格与UI设计。相较于前作较为冷色调的画面表现，本作的画面风格更加明快，而与有些刻板地带有RTS影子的前作界面UI相比，本作的UI设计也更加符合游戏侧重恶搞的轻松风格。但要说弊病的话，虽然每个人的感受都会有所差别，但本作的UI设计与画面色调更加接近于西式魔幻题材手游所带来的廉价感，或许会让玩家在印象上先打个折扣。但这也只是直观上的印象罢了，实际上认真观察的话，游戏的单位建模细节十分出色，例如制造机如果认真观看制造过程的话会发现整个流程十分完善，是很让人惊艳的细节刻画。

不仅是旁白，本作的剧情也充斥着无处不在的恶搞精神，故事中的每一句话都让人感觉到开发者就没打算好好讲个正经故事，而也就是这样的氛围给玩家带来更为轻松的游戏体验，在战役过程中仿佛时间很快就会过去，而玩家似乎也更容易融入这样的故事中，因为故事本来就是在乱来。

对于有个如此话痨的旁白在无时无刻吐槽的游戏来说，文本量真的是极大，而值得庆幸的是，游戏的中文化水准很高，不仅将大量的梗都一一翻译了出来，而且在语言表达上还让玩家十分有亲切感，老实说上一次看到全程话痨吐槽玩梗而且翻译水准如此之高的游戏还是在《UnEpic》的时候了，和那个资深宅主角相对应的，这里的旁白也明显就是个让玩家倍感亲切的资深宅。不过也是由于文本量过多的缘故吧，美中不足的地方就是部分错别字和有些语句的语序出错，应该都是翻译过程中打字太快导致的，如果之后有余裕能够一一校对出来就好了，至少也要先把系统界面上的错字改正了，我记得在功能面板上至少有一项的介绍文字是语序出错的，不过具体忘记了，好像是科技树界面吧。

基本上能够感受到，本作无论是从美术设计上，还是契合由喋喋不休的旁白和充满恶搞精神的游戏风格，都致力于营造出让游戏的整体风格更加轻松的氛围。这样的表现方式能够让玩家减轻可能在游戏中产生的作恶时的罪恶感，虽然对于在这类游戏中作恶是否有人会产生罪恶感还需要另外探讨，也把侧重恶搞的这一游戏特色发挥到了极致。

而且不仅仅是上了野蔷薇，在商店页的评论区也有开发者对评论的反馈，不难看出开发者极其重视国内玩家，这一点上来说真的是难能可贵。从游戏上架后到现在的更新次数也能够看出开发者的认真程度。

游戏本身是十分有意思的，而且很有粘性，说实在一旦上手时间不知不觉就会过去，如果一局能够无休止地进行下去的话说是时间黑洞也不为过，我的游戏时长看起来不长主要是因为我电脑散热坏了玩着玩着就会死机导致的，老实说应该有不少时间没被统计进去。顺便我觉得从游戏的画面表现上来说应该能够更进一步优化才是，目前来看随着游戏时间的增加内存占用率会越来越高，也可能只是因为我电脑坏了的缘故吧。

值得一提的是作为英雄单位的沙雅的塑造，是本作的一大出彩之处。一个十分有个性的角色，作为玩家的左膀右臂，在游戏中的重要性自然不必说，关于她的剧情或许也是在充满恶搞的故事主线里唯一稍显正经的部分了。

但是有几点建议想提一下。

1.对于这样一款游戏来说，在玩家完成战役之后，更多的就是自定义的遭遇战了，相对而言如果能够有更多可选择的英雄单位会让玩法更加丰富，希望之后能够通过DLC的形式发布新角色与相关的剧情战役。

2.地下城的守备单位都有各自的薪酬与生活需求，也就是说其还保留着个体意识，那么就希望能够加入种族间的喜恶与排斥等，例如哥布林与娜迦种族文化差异较大而会降低治疗量或无法在一定距离聚集、部分种族因为相近似而合作更加协调等等要素的话，会让游戏系统更加丰富。

这是一款完成度十分高的游戏，即便目前已经足够好玩了，但还是希望如果还有更新的话，能够变成一款更加有意思和特色的游戏。

—————2017.11.21—————

电脑修好以后我能够好好地玩一遍这款游戏的完整流程了，不用像之前那样断断续续来进行了，我要修改一下我之前的打分。

虽然创新的部分较少，但越是进行游戏越能感受到本作的完成度之高，尤其是主线流程的设计，要解锁全成就虽然有一定难度，但是这就要求玩家去摸索并且合理利用每一章新增的功能，在引导玩家了解游戏系统功能方面设计得真的是如同教科书一般规范，仅仅这一点就值得大夸特夸。

如果要玩一部地下城经营题材的作品，我认为只要玩本作就够了。非常抱歉我之前给本作打了四分（五分制），虽然目前仍有能够进步的空间，但这不妨碍我现在就十分想给这部作品打上满分。

36453262.review:
I love all the dungeons game.

Seems that this time the ultimate evil is to lazy to really bother fighting himself, instead he has a champion to do his bidding in the shape of a dark elf mage. The game continues with its sillyness and no respect for the fourth wall. But hey... thats what dungeons games are good for, laughing while building up your dungeon.

So yeah, it is silly with clear referances to popular games, movies, books and so on. But aside from that it is a solid strategy game that in some aspects i find better than the two previous games, i only wished that i could go bigger than 20 (+3 titans and 5 corrupted heros for a total of 28) minions, since you have many dungeon facilities needing horde, demons and undeads you find yourself assaulting the overworld map while your dungeon production of tool boxes and traps grind to a halt. Ofcourse you do not need to use all troops and personally i ended up having my undeads stay behind as a defensive force due to their quick recovery after death they simply could return to action quickly if needed.

another thing i loved was the zombies and skeleton archers. You can have 2 packs of 4, totaling to 16 undead troops that works great for defenses. however once you got magical trap making and enough magic toolboxes to spare then you can easily defend against anything even on the highest difficulty, this game can become easiest of the three.

Overall i highly recommend this game, i enjoyed every second of it.

36436386.review:
まだ攻略途中なので、このレビューに記載した内容が必ずしも正しいものとは限りません。
あくまで途中までプレイしたところで気になった点をメモしたような、参考程度の気持ちで読んで下さい。

[h1]【良い点】[/h1]

[b] ・マップのランダム生成[/b]

部屋の作り方にバラつきができるようになりました。

[b] ・中枢の部屋から十字方向に拓ける[/b]

さり気なく部屋の展開の自由度が上がってます。

[b] ・ホード、デーモン、アンデッドの同時運用が可能[/b]

混合編成が可能に。
また、通常召喚できるユニットに加え、各種族の特徴的な設備により、新たなユニットを増やしたり、パワーアップできたりもします。

[b] ・Thalyaがかわいい[/b]

いわゆるヒーローユニット的ポジションで、体力や攻撃力、スキルなどが強力。


[h1]【悪い点】[/h1]

[b] ・ユニットのバリエーションが少ない[/b]

各種族混合編成による弊害なのか、2の時にあったユニット強化は実質廃止。中には存在自体消されたユニットもいます。
このため一度に運用できるユニットの数、種類は増えたものの、全体的な種類自体は減っています。（一部増えたユニットもある）

これの弊害でもあるが、一部のトラップが消滅しているのも少しさみしい。
デーモンのクモ卵トラップが好きだったので…。

[b] ・種族を絞った攻略の自由度[/b]

前作などでは基本的に各種族を選択したらその種族しか使えなかったため、気にする必要のない点だった。
今作は種族が混合した状態で、リサーチツリーの開放によって設備やユニットを増やすことができるようになった。
このため、各種族に満遍なく設備や能力が配分されてるわけではない。

例えば…
ホードはオークやナーガによる継続的な近接戦闘が強く、各種トラップを有している。
デーモンはマナを生成、消費する能力や設備、魔法が充実し、各ツリーの拡張研究ができる。
アンデッドはホードユニットの蘇生や、マナを利用したトラップの強化などが揃っている。

一見すると幅広く見えるが、実際は近接戦闘の耐久力確保のためにオークが必要になったり、マナ関連の設備を使うためにデーモンツリーを開放し、マナ生成を担うデーモンを召喚する必要があったり、アンデッドツリーの強化トラップのためにホードツリーを開放する必要があったり、ホード蘇生施設はアンデッドユニットがいないと動かせなかったり…実際に各システムを運用するためにはバランスよく拡げていく事になり、気付くと似たような配分になってしまいます。


[h1]【まとめ】[/h1]

ゲームそのものは面白いので、文句なくおすすめできます。
前作との繋がりも強くはないので、初プレイでも支障は無いでしょう。
前作のようにDLCで何かしらの追加要素があるかもしれないので、期待してます。

Bien bien bien ! Alors les grouillos.... Que dire ... Des profondeurs de mon donjon ... c'est à dire que la poitrine  opulente de ma succube préférée me perturbe un peu les sens voyez vous.... (note pour plus tard: améliorer le niveau de zoom)....
J'ADORE votre jeu ! j'avais bien aimé dungeon keeper et je n'ai pas connu dungeon 2. 
Sur  le 3 les sallles sont bien fichues et après la campagne je m'éclate sur le mode escarmouche. L'aspect tactique prend de l'ampleur sur l'évolution du donjon au fil de la partie c'est assez sympa, la course pour améliorer ses bestioles est prenante et on se retrouve à chercher le donjon ultime et autonome même lorsque l'on pourrait aller poutrer "ceux d'en haut",mais l'on se plait à voir fonctionner le système même en fin de partie. Que rajouter ? des salles avec des monstres différents, des capacités en plus pour les grouillos (piocher plus vite, aller chercher des ressources dehors....), étendre l'interraction avec l'extérieur: permettre aux "gentils " de reconstruire certaines place fortes, capturer et mettre en esclavage des vilageois du monde d'en haut pour des tâches spécifiques, BREF quoi être encore PLUS le mal absolu ! pouvoir occuper des sites stratégiques (fabrication d'armes, ressources).... Au niveau de l'ambiance , il me semble que dungeon keeper était un peu plus dark en tout cas ça pourrait être le cas dans le prochain opus (ça n'empêche pas l'humour). Pour finir un scénario plus étoffé, une campagne plus longue avec des chapitres plus scénarisés. Allez les grouillos, un baffe sur le crane et au travail sinon je vous balance dans le puit.

36391833.review:
I want to start off with saying this is my first Dungeons game.  I am a big Blizzard fan overall, I have played every Warcraft game starting back on DOS, and this is the first game similar I have played that gives me the same kind of feeling I got playing Warcraft 2 or Warcraft 3, whilie making fun with those games.  Obviously the creators are fans of Blizzard and this game is a fun way of being creative while creating something similar but their own.  

Overall it is fun, however it is somewhat limited by very few gameplay modes, once you beat the campaign, it doesn't feel like there is much left to do.  Skirmish mode is lacking in features, and I have yet to play the multiplayer aspect of the game, however I see great potential of them releasing more content to correct the bland feeling left over once you finish the initial game.  

Skirmish would benifit from having more modes, and more map features, for instance, most of the overworld maps only have a few enemy camps that send troops, and the hero portals inside the dungeons are limited to one portal and one entrance.  If you like building up the dungeon and benefitiing from the use of traps and mazes, there isn't much point in replaying if you can easily kill the enemies with a few ice crushers before they even become a threat.  They implement diamon mines in all underworld areas, but having unlimited gold is pointless when your dungeon can easily be protected by just a few well placed traps once you are built up.  

Perhaps new enemies like sappers that can destroy doors and traps, or even drill tanks that can carve out walls for invading enemies would be something to expand the danger in defending your dungeon after a certain level.  Or even have camp respawning in the overworld that increase level on endless.  

More map variation would be nice as well.  It is always the same terrain after the campain is over.  

Great game, I look forward to content DLC preferably in the form of more campaigns, but I am more likely to spend my free time playing Starcraft 2.

A história começa quando você vira uma alma maligna e entra no corpo da princesa, fazendo com que ela volte-se contra seu próprio império e comece uma guerra. A partir disto, você vira a "maldade" do jogo dominando território e transformando toda a natureza e beleza doreino em apenas escuridão e morte.

A progressão do jogo é um pouco lenta e demanda tempo no modo campanha, mas não deixa de ser aproveitador e divertido cada momento do jogo, fiz um vídeo do jogo e convido você para tirar suas próprias conclusões:

36342174.review:
If there were any nitpicks it would have to be some QOL and balancing changes. OTherwise, steller and enjoyable game.

- The current matchmaking system is horrid when it comes to trying to find games. You have to spam creating a public games for a chance of someone else of notcing the ID numbers. A server/game browser of some kind to better the experience of mutlplayer would be a great evil.

- if you are fast with your gameplay, (such as changing the keybinding ect) the game will play itself out as you and your dungeon become overpowered much faster before even the "Golden" versions of heros are allowed spawn, even on hellish diffcuilty. Perhaps if there were a "super golden" versions of heros blessed by the goddess herself or heros that are trained to fight certain types of minons (Demon hunters, exorcist, and Monster hunters come to mind) to discourge creating a one trick army.

- Manual traps and most automatics are fully overshadowed by the  " Ice Crusher + Ice spike" combo. Sure, it expensive, but once place it will deal so much dmg that it begs the question of whats the point of other traps if this combo can litterly one shot anything that walks into it while keeping the dead freash to be thrown into a prison.

- There is an strange dely when picking up gold with the hand of terror. When you want to "spam" click to hurry and move it elsewhere more useful, the hand would be unable to keep up and be set in a que fellowing the order/path of the clicks you made. Personally a request I would make is being able to hold down a button or spell that would collect gold or other pickups of the same type in one swoop without the weird dely.

- The combat of D3 highly favours range DPS over melee due to the pathing system. Sure, you could mico manage the movment of your armies but every sec spent trying to move is more time for the heros to do thier dmg. Why waste time waiting for your minons to get in postion when an army of demons/undead can snipe targets one by one. If there is a combat triangle of X minon beats Y hero better then Z hero, then i never felt or notice it. 

If I think of anything else, i'll edit this at another time. I'm really looking forward to Future DLC level(s). I hope they will be as challaging as the "Game of winter" from D2.

36323438.review:
There was a time when Dungeon Keeper was a thing and everyone was happy about that. Developed by serial success artists, Bullfrog, Dungeon Keeper made you the bad guy, trapped you underground and released floods of do-gooders to pinch your gold and slaughter your troops. So you diligently mined out rooms, produced traps and bulked up your army of goblins, spiders and ghosts to thwart them. Many hours were lost to malicious chuckling, a sequel was produced and loved by all, and evil overlords destroyed all that was good worldwide. Then EA came along and ruined a good thing, as EA are wont to do. The series and the genre it championed were forgotten about for decades, until an awful mobile port dripping with beloved EA staples like microtransactions came along to be derided by a sneering fanbase.

While the founding title was cut down in its prime by a mixture of corporate greed and general incompetence (I’m not bitter), other titles have taken up the mantle from time to time to try to appeal to Keeper’s now nomadic fanbase. Games like Craft the World, Evil Genius and War for the Overworld are all worth a mention, but so too is the Dungeon series. The initial release was a clumsy but honest tribute to Bullfrog’s fallen juggernaut that did little more than clumsily ape its inspiration. The second release tried to do more, by allowing your rampaging hoards to leave the murky underground and reign chaos on the world above. The third game offers more of the same.

It would be a disservice to suggest that Dungeons III is just the second game with a few new maps lobbed in (especially when Dungeons II has that rarest of things; genuinely good DLC campaign extensions that do just that without the need for a sequel). There are changes afoot. For one, there is a much greater number and variety of missions that often go above and beyond just having you patiently build an unstoppable force and roll over everything when the time’s right. One early mission pits you against a fortified town filled with formidable gluttons. The only way to break their defences is to routinely hijack their food shipments until you starve them out and can put them to the sword. Another asks you to collect various ingredients from both the under and overworld to sacrifice so that you can summon a new demon ally. Another introduces a day/night cycle that has you under siege from hardy foes by day, but sees them exhausted at night, allowing you to creep around relatively unchallenged while they slumber and you destroy all their stuff.

Trying to juggle both aspects of the experience was a staple of the previous Dungeons game, but only up to an extent. Now the two halves are more symbiotic and feel much more like a whole.

In Dungeons II, you were free to lurk in your lair, building up your army and slaughtering the occasional band of heroes who journeyed into your depths in the name of goodness until you wanted to venture out. Some of that remains the same: the construction of your lair and the smooth management of your numerous facilities continues to be the foundation of a worthwhile army of evilness. You still need a constant supply of mined gold to pay wages or make purchases. Your troops need to be housed, fed and maintained. Want to start building traps to chip away at would-be defenders? You’ll need the machinery to produce it and the manpower to put it all in place. Want to start using the corpses of your enemies to animate a few zombies? You’ll need a graveyard for that. 

Full Review // http://www.honestgamers.com/13633/pc/dungeons-3/review.html

An easy and funny game much like the ancient Dungeon Keeper. You have to expand your  dungeon and build an army before attack the heroes. The difference is that you have to keep an eye on surface, besides your dungeon. So you have two battle fields. 

I'm playing in inferno mode (difficult) and It is easy to pass. 

Crazy dialogues and narrator. Very very funny, if you are old enough to understand the jokes. 

**********************************

Un juego sencillo y divertido, al estilo del Dungeon Keeper. El jugador debe construir su mazmorra y preparar un ejército para atacar a los héroes. La diferencia está en que debes atender a la superficie, aparte de tu mazmorra. Por lo que tienes dos campos de batalla.

Estoy jugando en modo infernal (difícil) y es sencillo de pasar. 

Los diálogos y el narrador son muy locos. Muy muy divertido,, si eres lo suficientemente mayor para entender algunas de las bromas.

36292543.review:
我非常喜欢这个游戏，优点很多，但是我比较懒，不想长篇大论，所以优点我就不赘述了，希望开发人员体谅。
我只想说一下这游戏就我个人观点的不足之处。
困难难度下，游戏前中期，英雄的压迫感还是很强的，但到了后期（尤其玩家出了高级魔法陷阱后），简直无聊死了，我在最大的图中，3个英雄传送点+地下城入口一共4个出兵点，我挖了4个九曲十八弯的大迷宫，针对每个出兵点，全部布满了陷阱，然后发现英雄们连第一个喷火器+减速地板+喷火地板的陷阱组合都过不去。
与花费了很大精力去设计、打造、收集之后，最后却被轻易击溃的挫败感相比，同样是花费了很的大精力去设计运营出自己非常满意的地下城，到了最后却发现敌人连第一个陷阱都过不去的颓废感，我宁可去体验挫败感，因为它至少带给了我不屈与再挑战的反作用力。
可那种颓废感一直在自我否定，感觉自己花费的精力与智商，被自己的完美主义情结和执着给侮辱了，并且被理智疯狂的嘲讽：“蠢货！这根本毫无意义，你简直就是弱智，你只需要挖一条直线，两组喷火器组合陷阱，不！应该叫诛仙剑阵！完全可以遇神杀佛,遇佛杀魔,遇魔杀人,与人杀神!”  
（-_________-）

这游戏给我感觉就是偏重经营和策略，但经营到最后却发现根本没事做（当然我只是针对类似无限模式或者喜欢玩大后期的玩家来说的）。
所以我真心希望开发人员能着重强化游戏性，尤其针对游戏中后期，多一些种类的英雄，或者当推掉地面的所有建筑之后，会有BOSS进入地下城等等（无限模式）。
最后希望游戏越做越好，多DLC，多完善，喜欢的人越来越多。
祝好运！

地下城系列有趣的地方一如既往，所以我们直接开始挑刺：
        1.玩的越久就越是没有意思，敌人全部由陷阱搞定。
        2.兵种构成几乎没有选择，几乎千篇一律。
        3.剧情单薄，虽然有种地下城就该如此的感觉，但是真的很没劲。
        4.部队一旦成型，剩下的只有平推。


所以我们玩家需要的是：不同风格的建筑选择（类似于天赋树，选一弃二等）
                                      战斗单位更多的培养方向（比如兽人战士每只都可以选择2-3种升级方向，如双持狂暴战或者重甲兵）
                                      更有惊喜的剧情
                                      更有挑战性的战斗

        最后：这是个好游戏，希望大家都能从中获得乐趣

游戏是好游戏，但打折感觉遥遥无期=3=等不及就原价入了，没赶上预购很可惜。
总的来说就是挖造打，一款很不错的经营（兼rts？）游戏。
中文翻译很不错，另外似乎有合作模式不过我还没有尝试过，地下没法操作所以部队战斗能力会打一些折扣，不过其实地上也没什么太大操作空间=3=个人感觉陷阱就目前来讲作用可以被部队取代，自动陷阱伤害低，手动陷阱伤害可以但陷阱难道不就是为了可以不用费劲回来点一下才有的嘛！每次都要回来点一下我宁可警卫室里放几个兵或者干脆开个传送门回来，而且高级陷阱还要专门点一条科技树，感觉不太划算。

36272353.review:
I've had quite a bit of fun with this game and I'm not done yet. The base building is quite enjoyable and the struggle to decide on what should be researched and built next. Do I want to focus on traps so i don't have to rush back to my dungeon to protect it or do I want to work on learning to open portals so I can rush back or get my army out of trouble if I bight of more than I can handle. Typically I stick with portals. The comedy is wonderful and puts a nice light hearted spin on being the evil. 

Thalya and the Narrator are also a hoot as well and I found myself rather engaged with the story. The hints the narrator dropped early on were a nice touch to as it left me wondering if this was the mission they'd come to pass or not. I hope they both return in future versions of this game or expansions to it.

My only issue is at times I just want to set back and watch the animation in the dungeon. This is more my own fault though. Just got to force myself to relax, remind myself I've found the diamond mine and have a bunch of level 7 troops. I can relax and watch them work. Just enjoy watching the succubi converting a hero, the orc in the tinkerworkshop making traps oh and be sure to toss some people into the sacrificial alter in the temple to the ultimate evil. I'm still trying to figure out everything that comes out of that.

36242752.review:
Retouvez l'intégralité de mon [url=http://www.jeek.fr/dungeons-3-le-test-sur-pc/1777] Test de Dungeons 3 sur Jeek[/url].

Dungeons 3 est un mix entre STR et Tower defense dans lequel vous devez gérer un donjon pour à la fois vous défendre des invasion adverses mais aussi construire une armée suffisament forte pour envahir le monde extérieur.
Vous disposez donc en permanence de 2 map entre lesquels vous devez alterner les phases d'attaque te défense/gestion.

La rareté de ce genre de gameplay pourrait suffir à justifier l'achat de ce jeu mais Dungeons 3 vous propose encore 2 choses rares et vraiment fun:
-Vous incarnez le mal et dedevez détruire tout ce qui est gentil et mignon :)
-Le jeu est une gigantestque parodie humouristique de l'univers de Warcraft et intégrant de nombreux clins d'oeil aux canons de la geek culture (starwars, le seigneurs des anneaux...)

Si le jeu n'est pas d'une stratégie très poussé et se révéle assez simple, on y joue surtout pour son humour omniprésent et sa gestion de donjon très ludique. Quoi de plus plaisant que de torturer les héros énnemis dans une salle de torture ou encore de les laisser pourrir en prison puis de les voir se relever d'entre les morts sous forme de zombie dans votre cimetierre?

Bref ce jeu est un pur concentré de fun à consommer sans modération.

Pros:

    - Incarner Le Mal
    - L'humour complétement barré
    - Une VF de grande qualité
    - Les références et les clins d'oeil
    - Enfin un Tower Defense !

Cons:

    - Ergonomie des menus d'action perfectible
    - Aspect stratégique assez limité, surtout en surface
    - Pas d'invasion de donjon en multi
    - Rejouabilité limité

Mon test et démonstration de gameplay en vidéo:
https://youtu.be/YWfFEs5qHgE

Un 1er épisode très décevant, un second très prenant et ce troisième est simplement excellent.

Le mécanisme peut sembler répétitif avec la variété des salles et créatures limitée. Tout cela est cependant largement compensé par un scénario écrit avec brio et un humour remplis de références au monde de la musique, du cinéma, de la tv mais également de jeux vidéo. Qui a dit un singe à trois têtes ?

Le retour du conteur est quant à lui une excellente nouvelle pour les fans de la série.

36191613.review:
so i just completed the campaign and ive gotta say. this is by far the best dungeons game yet. however there are definetly areas of improvment. overall i really enjoyed it. especially at the price i paid. 

THE GOOD:
The interactivness of the map. the idea of having to conquer certain areas to gain "evilness" for research, is a good idea. having to defend these areas from heros is a better idea.

More everything! more spells, traps, and creatures. in this installment you have control over the demons and undead as well as the horde. you dont have to choose a faction. infact inorder to make the most out of your dungeon you need to have all three factions working together.

The narrator obviously. it wouldnt be a good dungeons game with out the stupid funny puns and ripped quotes from the narrator, who now has a competitor that makes for hillarious comintary.

Longer campaign. theres about 20 missions all taking an averagre an hour depending how you play. (i personally like to upgrade everything before one final sweep)

There is a limit. the count of the little snots and creatures are seperate now. you can have a max of 15 lil snots, which is nice, however, you can only have a max of 20 creatures. and every creature counts as one. plus you can convert heros into dozens of undead or to your side. plus you can get your own hereos or "titans" which are really powerful, but not invinceable. but they dont cost any command points because you can only get one from each of the three factions


THE BAD
while there is more of everything i found my self not using a lot of things. mostly traps and spells. there are only like 3 worth while spells, and the traps are seperated between manual and automatic. which is exactly what it sounds like. manual traps will only work if you slap them at the right time. so there pointless unless your on top of every notification

the hoard is under powered now, both the demons and undead will resurect automatically when they die while the hoard just straight up die. until you get the crypt over halfway through the campaign. the goblins are weak as ever and the nagga can only heal hoard units.

another thing is that only orc and goblins can upgrade and can only upgrade to the ironhides and gob-o-bots. and nagas are strict healers. so no naga queens or assassins or war chiefs. also there are no trolls at all and no forge to personalize your creatures.

as with every dungeon game once you complete the campaign its kind of boring with nothing else to do.

OVERALL: still a great game for only $40 with lots of room for improvment. hours of funny comintary and actually entertaining missions

WISH'S FOR THE FUTURE
i think adding a thrid faction to the war of good and evil, something like the "neutral" like how theres angels (good) and demons (evil) and fallen angels (neutral) and adding a counquest mode, kind of simillar to the old star wars battlefront 2 galatic conquest mode. outside the campaign. where you can choose to play good, evil, or neutral. and play across a grand map expanding your research to unlock more features in battles. than when you fight in actual battles itll be like a normal skirmish and each faction gets its own "dungeon area" good on a mountain, evil underground, etc. and you have to fight across a map to get into the opposing sides "dungeons" to defeat them. thats just my own persoanl idea of what would give the game a lot of replay value.

Also, im Prinzip ein echt gelungener Nachfolger zu Dungeons 2. Die Kampagne ist wirklich sehr gut aufgebaut und sehr verschieden, auch der Sprecher aus Dungeons 2 ist ein voller Erfolg. Ich klicke die Einführungen im Normalfall weg doch bei diesem Sprecher ist für Unterhaltung purr gesorgt. 

Der Techtree ist auf alle Fälle ein Highlight, man benötigt dadurch längere Zeit um seine Truppen 100% aufzurüsten, dadurch wird einem nicht gleich langweilig ^^.

Einer meiner Kritikpunkte ist der Multiplayer, aus meiner Sicht einfallslos gestaltet. Man ringt mit den anderen Spieler um Bösartigkeitspunkte (Maximal 8000) wer dies als erster schafft gewinnt. Leider sind 8000 Punkte viel zu wenig um die Forschung ordentlich zu betreiben. Für ein schnelles Game wirklich gut mehr aber auch nicht.

Eventuell könnte man ein Modus erstellen in dem man mit seinen Truppen in den gegnerischen Dungeon eindringen kann wie die Invasionen der Helden. 

Im Sale würde ich das Spiel sofort empfehlen 44€ momentanpreis etwas zu hoch.

36144516.review:
Das Spiel ist sehr interessant und umfangreich. Es ist zwar das erste mal dass ich sowas wie "Dungeon" oder "Dungeon Keeper" was ähnlich ist spiele, aber ich kenne mich mit strategie Spiele aus und hatte nicht wirklich schwierigkeiten das Spielprinzip zu verstehen. 
Das Spielprinzip ist, dass du dein Reich des Bösen aufbaust und alles was nach Einhorn und Regenbogen riecht und aussieht vernichten willst. Du wirst   von Helden besuchst, die das Herz deines Dungeons zerstören müssen , dann dibt es in deimem Dungeon Kreaturen die du finden kannst und die dich auch ständig nerven werden, du kannst natürlich so machen , dass die Helden, wenn die dein Dungeon besuchen auf die Kreaturen treffen und erst die bekämpfen. Doch so kriegst du keine EXP, also musst du eine Balance finden. 
Wichtig in diesem Spiel ist das Manegement von Raum und Resourcen. Wichtig Sind auch Erforschungen. Du kannst nicht nur alles für Untote erforschen und dabei auf Dämonen verzichten, du Muss alles erforschen und haben um das spiel zu gewinnen. 
Was schwierigkeitsgrad angeht, ich habe mir meinem Kumpel im Skirmish aud Hellish Schwierigkeit erst nach ca.15 Mal 
geschaft das Spiel zu gewinnen. Dazwischen haben wir einmal auf Schwierigkeit normal gespielt und für uns war das viel zu einfach.
Schade finde ich, dass man die Kreaturen, die man im Dungeon findet nicht zähmen kann. Meiner Meinung nach wäre es viel logischer.
Schade ist es, dass die fallen die man erlernt erst ca.nach midgame erforscht werden, bis dahin muss man es schaffen nur mit seinen Truppen durchzuhalten, was ziehmlich sehr schwer ist. Ich hätte es so gemacht, dass man einige fallen früher erforschen kann, das gleiche geht auch die einfacheren Türen an. Es ist so, als ob Türen irgendwelche Hight end Nano-Technologien waren xD.
Ansonsten mach das Spiel viel Laune.

36143702.review: Сюжет и реализация неплохая, но все впечатление от игры портиться ее забагованностью и постоянными вылетами и зависаниями на Mac OS. Играть просто невозможно

36142651.review:
I recommend this to anyone that liked the previous game, Dungeons 2, and those who haven't tried the previous one, but think a more light-hearted dungeon management game with lots of fourth wall breaking and (bad) jokes could be fun.

This review is only really based on the single-player campaign, since that is usually my focus in games, and what I enjoy playing.
The game is very similar to the previous one in its cartoony style and tone, so it obviously isn't for people, who wants a more serious and dark game. The reference-loving narrator returns from the previous title, along with this game's main character the Dark Elf Talia, who competes to see who can shatter the precious fouth wall the most.

Minor Story spoiler:
[spoiler]This is one of those games where you are the "evil" faction, but the good characters are just as bad if not worse...
 Racist, greedy, narcissistic, and self-righteous. Which is a bit weird in a comedy-game, where you are supposed to be the absolute evil. You don't really expect that you end up in situations where you are supposed to be the lesser evil. Not really a negative or positive for me, after all Overlord is my favorite "Evil" game, and in the first one you can pretty much play as the savior of the land, despite being called evil.[/spoiler]

A lot of the creatures from the previous game returns, but instead of playing as three different factions, you are now combined into one faction, with three creatures from horde, three demons, and three undead. Each faction also has a "task" in your overall dungeon. Demons creates and need mana as well as torture heroes, the horde creates trap and has training equipment, and the undead can resurrect. And one Elite creature from each sub-faction. In the story of the game the focus is far more on Talia than it is the creatures. Which does lead to a more focused story-line, but I kinda enjoy maps in this kind of games where the goal is to recruit a certain race to your side. There are maps for the elite, but I would have liked for the more common creatures too, but seeing as the story is meant to be a new campaign after the ultimate Evil's conquest in the first game, it wouldn't make so much sense, I guess, to recruit creatures like the naga/goblin who are already loyal since they are returning from the previous game.
This time most creatures can't be upgraded other than rising in level, but I feel they do a good job balancing each other and serving different purposes, and there aren't any completely worthless creatures in the later levels.

I really like that converted heroes aren't just converted, but they actually change their design/colors to visualize the change, and show that they have properly fallen into evil.

Not sure if I prefer this one or the previous one, but they are both very solid Dungeon Management games, and I am glad I bought it and played it.

End note for achievement hunters: The achievements are very easy to keep track of. There are 60 achievement, 3 for each campaign map/level, one of which is completing the map, and the achievements are shown before you begin the map.

So Ihr lieben, nachdem ich das Spiel durch habe mit etwas über 30 Stunden möchte ich ein großes Lob und Realmforge Studios und Kalypso Media Digital.
Selten hat mich und meine Zuschauer ein Spiel so mitgenommen und unterhalten wie dieses.
Es ist einfach genial, von mir bekommt es auf jeden Fall eine Empfehlung.
Grafisch ist es die Typische schicke animierte Dungeons Grafik.
Das Gameplay läuft flüssig und ist überraschend komplex durch einen genialen Skillbaum den es zu erkunden lohnt.
Die Story ist einfach nur geil, so witzig und packend zugleich.
Natürlich ist Talya mit Ihrer gespaltenem Persöhnlichkeit perfekt eingebaut und der Erzähler ist absoluter Oberhammer.
Die Witze die Ihr rein bringt so wie die "verarschen" wenn man es so nennen will an unmengen andere Marken wie zb. "World of Warcraft" oder "Herr der Ringe" usw. traumhaft.
Danke das Ihr dieses Spiel entwickelt habt, mit besten Grüßen und wünschen TimoTime und seine Community <3

Wie auch beim Vorgänger wird hier alles durch den Kakao gezogen ob nun Filme (u.a. Harry Potter, Herr der Ringe, Star Wars...) oder Spiele, die Entwickler machten vor nichts halt. Selbst die wohl "bekannte" Warum liegt hier Stroh-Szene wurde integriert. Der Sprecher hat seine Arbeit wiedermal gut gemacht, obwohl ich persönlich finde, das er hier und da schon etwas nervig erscheint, aber den Sprecher kann man ja in den Optionen deaktivieren.

Das Spiel bietet gewohntes und hier und da leichte Verbesserungen. Erst wird der Dungeon ausgebaut und verteidigt, dann geht es an die Kämpfe auf der Oberwelt, manche Missionen kommen auch völlig ohne Basenbau aus.
Der Schwierigkeitsgrad wurde, gegenüber dem Vorgänger, leicht angezogen, aber alles in allem ist man mit einer guten Basis im Rücken immer recht gut aufgestellt.

Wer den Vorgänger mochte wird hier auch seine Freude haben, genauso wie Dungeon Keeper Fans, wer derben Humor mag und auch mal den einen oder anderen Patzer verschmerzen kann ist hier gut aufgehoben.

Die komplette Kampangne lässt sich auch im Koop durchspielen, was nochmal einen neuen Reiz ausmacht, da man sich sämtliche Ressourcen und Monster teilt.

Spätestens in einem Sale sollte man dann aber doch zuschlagen.

36101583.review:
Alrity thralls, i have been giving this game some hours of gaming and i still enjoy it and i have not found anything serious to complain over. I notice there are those who mention it is just a tune up of other dungeons games and yeees in a way they are correct- "maybe" that is why it is called Dungons 3 and they dont even try to hide that detail that the old Dungeon Keeper etc is what inspired them. Also the narrator in game cracks jokes about it. 

Now about the game it is a simple straight up game with research, managing, upgrading and see to it that all the spoiled creatures in your dump has what they need to keep their complaining to a minimum. 
Plenty of traps to choose from to cripple your enemies, burn&frostbite or squeesed like a bug will all send the heroes in shiny armors to slowly starve to death in your dark&moisty dungeons concentration camp or beaten & tortured to death in a entertaining torture chamber. 

Do not start playing it on Easy, start on normal is my advice. 

Yes there are room for dlc etc, and the developer should seriously make a "tip" link or something so people can send them serious ideas for what to include in such a ugrade. I wish i could see wounded enemies running away screaming in fear or in fire, (in a cartoonish way that is) just to brake the somewaht stagnant behavior during battles maybe even the first useless goblin creature could be usable by a upgrade/option turning it into a wounded enemy hunter lurking around in the dungeon.. There are countless of possibilites for a developer to work on here if they would be willing to get free ideas- If they want to continue to mine this Dungeon3 goldmine ofcource. 

Yes I recommend this game, not for daily playing since it can be repeating if you overplay it, but as a entertaining weekend game with your phone turned off and a cold beer or a herbal smoke it is recommended.

36086087.review:
Wieder einmal ein schönes Dungeons-Spiel, welches sich die guten Sachen der Vorgänger angenommen hat und viele Schwächen beseitigt.

Der Erzähler ist wie immer ein Witzbold und es gibt viele Zunpfahlwinkereinen in Richtung Filme, Serien und anderer Spielereihen, jedoch irgendwie kam es mir so vor, als wären die Witze weniger geworden.
(Dafür wird jetzt öfter mal über die Entwickler spottisch erzählt... ;) )

Die Story ist bekannterweise gut und geht mit einer steuerbaren Heldin neue Wege.

Leider gibt es auch neue Schwächen, wie das einklappende Menü oder das manchmal verwirrende System des Raumbaus (Brauerei mit 10x10 Feldern und 2 automatische Braukessel, die jeweils 3x3 Felder brauchen, laut Hinweis soll der Raum aber angeblich zu klein sein...)

Für den 4. Teil wünsche ich mir mehr Einheitenauswahl, ein besserer Forschungsbaum und evtl. eine Weltkarte, bei der wir die Ziele in gewisser Weise selbst aussuchen können und es somit auch optionale Missionen gibt, wo man bspw. ein Goodie für folgende Missionen finden kann. (Sowas wie einen Goldmagneten für die Schnodderlinge, die dann mehr/schneller Gold sammeln)

36077762.review:
I never played Dungeons 1 & 2, but I can't recommend this game enough if you liked Warcraft 2 and Dungeon Keeper.

Between the campaign and trying to win a skirmish on Hellish difficulty, I definitely got my $40 worth. The story is well done and the narrator is hilarious. I'm not really into multiplayer RTS but I've been having tons fo fun with skirmish mode trying to optimize my dungeon, planning elaborate trap systems, and playing with different variations of horde, undead, and demons.

From a developer standpoint, I'm impressed that Realmforge packed such an awesome game into a small file size (for today's standards) and there are barely any loading times when starting.

My biggest gripe was that I couldn't select my preset groups of characters with the number keys while in the dungeon, but that seems to have been fixed with the latest update. That makes it sooooo much easier to send out my raiding party to take over towns and sources of evil instead of using F2 to interrupt my guys that are working on traps, mana, etc. Thank you Realmforge!

Some other minor things:
1. I feel like there should be a difficulty level between Normal and Hellish. On second though, nevermind. I probably would have just played on that difficulty and not had so much fun trying to win on Hellish mode.
2. I liked planning different systems of traps, but it is all moot once you get magical traps because the magical Crusher is OP and just two placed after a tar pool kills entire raids of elite mobs instantly. I guess I should just adjust my play style and not use them though...

36063640.review: 重复却又不完全重复的战役关卡可以说是这个游戏的亮点，虽然每一局战役起始都是发展开凿地下，制造房间，寻找金矿，但是下一局总有一些你还没见过的新的房间，或者是新的玩法，使得战役里需要反反复复重复的初始发展变得没那么无趣。墓园，监狱，以及调♂教♂室，这些非常有趣的房间给一局游戏的中期添加了许多乐趣。调教精灵小姐姐什么的！嗯！我才没有兴奋呢！还有旁白那贱贱的吐槽！嗯，字幕组真的挺用心的。很多美式英语的梗都好好的翻译过来了。作为反派的剧情，给人了发泄平时不能发泄的破坏欲的机会。即使知道这样不对，也会下意识的想说 ”shut up and just do it!"。作为一款RTS游戏，它可以有效的帮你发泄不愉快的心情，却又不会使你过度沉迷其中，无疑是心情不好想发泄的时候的好的选择。

36060454.review:
Отличное продолжение. Не знаю какой была первая Dungeons, не играл, видимо дрисня (по слухам). Но вторая была очень достойная, а третья уже великолепная. 4-я наверное будет шедевральная.

Пофиксили на самом деле очень многие вещи.

Больше не закликиваешься до посинения апгрейдами в комнате троллей, теперь можешь развиваться туда, куда пожелаешь и каждая ветка продумана.

Во второй, когда ты играл не за орков, ты не понимал что куда, другая раса, вся херня иная, но сделана вообщем-то под копирку. Теперь 3 расы вместе и дополняют друг друга. Можешь не пытаться объять все, а скажем вкачивать дальнобойных демонов и их потребности. Впрочем, вкачать все тоже ничего не мешает.

Ловушки приобрели больше смысла и разнообразия. Раньше можно было обойтись камнями и теслами из Red Alert, все остальное в принципе было фуфлом. Опять же, стратегия - по полной качаешь монстров и тогда забиваешь на ловушки, либо ловушками облегчаешь, тогда орки, либо магией, тогда демоны.

По интерфейсу сначала возникают вопросы, но для меня уже сбор всех существ в один клик перекрывает любые неудобства. По отзывчивости снова вопросов нет. На самом деле, как они это делают? Десятки уродов швыряешь, у всех свои анимации, на карте тоже дофига всего интересного, а все равно плавно работает.

На коварстве теперь все завязано, что разумно. Но больше нет такого момента, что ты где-то треть сессии сидишь строишься, а потом идешь добывать коварство, чтобы поднять уровень подземелья. Надо сразу засылать и добывать очки.

Добавление героини - лучшее в продолжении. Зло злом, каким бы абсолютным оно не было, но это лишь фигура на фоне. А тут няша-эльфийка, да с бэкграундом и всегда центровая в геймплее. Еще бы ей ветку развития - цены бы не было, но может увидим еще.

По сюжету понятно. Невольный народ, Танос, "ты не пройдешь" и все вот это. Удачно продолжают троллить все на свете. )

Из минусов пока только технический момент - загрузка. В первые дни релиза вообще запустить не мог. Полчаса грузило и я забивал. С последним апдейтом вроде нормально стало, но уже боюсь продолжать из сейвов, добиваю миссии компании целиком.

Слишком мало внимания к такой замечательной игре. Тащим Dungeons продажами и отзывами!

36058415.review:
Nachdem das Unheimlich aufgeregte böse (meine wenigkeit ;D) sich dungeons 3 gekauft hatte und nun einige stunden damit verbrachte die grausam liebevoll gestaltete welt dieses grandiosen spiels erkundete, entschied es sich kurzerhand eine empfehlung zu schreiben.

Da ich den vorgänger schon gespielt hatte wusste ich natürlich ungefär worauf ich mich hier einlies.
trotzdem hatt mich das spiel sehr positiv überrascht.

schon diese kleinen aufmerksamkeiten das man z.B. beim starten des Spiels um mitternacht mit einem kleinen gack bezüglich der geisterstunde begrüßt wird macht dieses spiel umso genialer.
Mit seinem humor und schön erzählten geschichte die nicht zu selten einem sehr bekannt vorkommen können punktet dieses spiel bei mir mit 10 von 10.

Die Leveldesigns sind von sich aus meist simpel gehalten.
Baue deinen dungeon aus, milde eine armee, gehe an die oberwelt und hau jemandem auf die mütze
Das ist so das standart prozedere. ab und zu noch ein bischen zeitdruck und gegenwehr des gegners und das wars an sich. doch muss das nichts negatives sein.

durch witzige erzählungen, ereignissen die selbst der erzähler nicht ganz verstehen und dem hauptpunkt, nemlich das sich das spiel selbst nicht ernst nimmt, werden auch diese alzu vorhersehbaren missionen zu einer achterbahn der eindrücke. 

von der vielfalt der möglichkeiten bin ich persönlich in diesem teil der reihe etwas überschüttet von imput.

es gibt so viele sachen die man erforschen kann, man steuert nichtmehr nur die horde, dämonen oder untoten sondern alle zusammen was meiner meinung nach zwar ganz gut funktioniert, ich persönlich jedoch ein großer fan von vielfalt bin und mir da 3 einzelne fraktionen besser gefallen hätten als dieser best of mix.

alles in allem jedoch ein tolles spiel das vorallem mit seinem humor glenzt und auch spielerisch ne menge her macht.
für mich zwar trotz "höllisch" modus keine herausforderung aber vieleicht mach ich da auch irgendwas falsch (oder richtig? keine ahnung wie man das nennen soll)

fazit:
wenn du humorfolle anspielungen auf andere spiele, filme oder was auch immer magst die weder sich noch dieses spiel wirklich ernst nehmen und mal eine andere erfahrung als "das ist kein spiel sondern alles ist ernst" willst dan kauf dir dieses spiel. 
selbst wen du nach den ersten 1:59 stunden spielzeit sagst "ne das is nix für mich das is mir zu albern" kannst du das spiel innerhalb von 2 wochen an steam zurückgeben und bekommst dein geld wieder.

wer diesem genialen spiel also nichtmal ne chanse gibt der verpasst etwas. garantiert!

36055042.review: I like the dungeons game not only because the funny acts in the campaign it is also a fun strategy game and dungeon builder in one, if you like good jokes, designing your own dungeons and see whoem is the better in tactic then this is the game you want.

36053970.review:
This was beyond fun a nice simple RTS dungeon builder.

Pros - 
Simple: It's easy to pick up and easy to get the hang of.

Well Writen: This made me laugh so much the narrator sold everything for me and the main girl added some charm.

Long Story: If you dont rush and are like me and just build build build and the story wont take you long if you rush but if not it can be a nice trip down building the biggest base that nobody can even get in to.

There are a ton more stuff i love about this but i'm too lazy to write it all.

Cons - 
A.I: Sometimes the minion A.I can be a bit wonky but it can be worked around.

Evilness: I felt the evil resource was a bit too little i understand it's to add a bit of longevity to the game but a little more wouldn't of hurt.

Timed Missions: Personal complaint here i'v always hated timed missions in RTS styled games cause i'm the type of person who likes to spend 2 hours building the most nicest base before i start doing other stuff in the level or mission it's not a deal breaker by any means but i just never liked them too much.

Builders: I felt a couple more little building minions would of been nice but not a big deal

I don't really have any other complaints other then i feel some Minions in the game have little purpose compared to others i felt the demons weren't really that big of deal to build unless you were focusing on turning good heroes over the Horde was honestly too good at every thing from Fighting / Defending but it don't matter too much it's still a damn fine game for people like simple RTS styled build em games.

9/10

36050901.review: Realmforge have finally got the formula right. Dungeons 3 is plain, straight, addictive fun from start to finish. Both Overworld and Dungeon sides are kept relatively simple so things never truly get frustrating, and every part of it remains satisfying, from smacking your minions to blasting dwarves in the face and watching their bodies fly across the floor. The developer have made sure both sides are supremely playable and compliment each other well, with loads of neat touches and details to make sure you always know what’s going on. That things can get a little repetitious is the only real downside, but with this formula I don’t think Realmforge can better it further. And Thalya’s great. Yes, fine, and the Narrator too. Don’t want him sulking on me.

36013218.review:
I love Dungeon Keeper type of games, and I loved Dungeons 2 but this one is step in wrong direction.
I played Dungeons 2 again few weeks ago just to refresh my memory and I enjoyed it lot more than this one.

This one has some good new ideas but it's very boring.

It feels like they wanted you to spend more time in the overworld and less in the dungeon.
The problem is, overworld hasn't improved that much.
In the second game I felt like the overworld was a chore.

For me all the dungeons were the same, build long tunel arround the edges of you dungeon, put rolling rock traps in it, and put your feet on the table. If the rolling rock trap is not available yet, build explosive chests instead.
The game didn't really force me to try different traps or combine them to combat different types of enemies.
It wasn't even necessary to think about building your dungeon because mostly there were no obstacles like rock, water, lava, or size constraints.

The writing also feels bit worse, and the constant 4th wall breaking is actually anoying because it's almost in every sentence.
The narator holds it above the water, but it's so so.

My final verdict is 5/10 - boring

36000112.review:
The original Dungeons was - though interesting in its own right - quite the misser. It was clear that Kalypso was going for a spiritual successor to Dungeon Keeper, but was threading the line to avoid copyright issues with Electronic Arts. Dungeons II, as a sequel, had a franchise to build on, and was bolder in where it ventured. Though also a nice game that would sooth the nerves of those who like building the perfect dungeon, the game's speed was exceptionally slow with upgrade after upgrade to be researched without too much change happening in the dungeon itself.

Dungeons III has improved upon the formula again and brought back even more elements from the infamous series. Minions have their own lairs and jobs, there is a variety of creatures to pick from, and imprisoning, torturing and sacrificing heroes is once more a thing. But even so, Kalypso has managed to take the whimsical overly satirical narrative of Dungeons II and spun it in such a way that Dungeons III can now be rightfully called its own game.

It has the good parts of Dungeon Keeper: there is a vast array of rooms and units to explore, and you can shape your army in the way you want to. It's a lot of fun watching the creatures do their own thing when left alone, and they absolutely have personality. The pacing is great: there are no dull moments, yet there is still more than enough time to slow things down if you personally feel a need to, allowing you to sit back and observe your Goblins toil away.

At the same time, the game has improved in areas Dungeon Keeper never could. We can visit the overworld. There are neutral creatures to be found underground. Players can customize their units a little bit with 'book'-type upgrades. They can fill in accidentally dug tiles. The game's got wall-based traps. There is a less linear tech tree that genuinely allows you to pick a playstyle you like. And on top of that: the "we're the bad guys this time around" mentality from the old games is there, but implemented in a fresh way - with constant over the top meta-humor. Dungeons III doesn't take itself seriously, realizes it doesn't take itself seriously, and often comments on how it isn't taking itself seriously. In this manner, the game has its own take on the satirical approach; a take which, for better or for worse, is at least unique.

+Good pacing; easy to play at your own pace by choosing to be defensive or offensive
+Characters and creatures have decent personality and the story is amusing in its own way
+Feels more like Dungeon Keeper than any spiritual successor to date, having a payload of similar rooms and mechanics
+Co-op; play the campaign with a friend and have fun together
+Accessible; you will enjoy this as both a Simcity or a StarCraft player

-Technically unstable. Had a hard time getting co-op working as the game kept giving me 'network errors' with no further clarification. The game is also prone to crashing on older systems, primarily due to the fact that...
-There are no graphics options. You can set the game to be full screen or not, that's it. Makes it incredibly hard to even try and prevent said crashes.
-The game often responds sluggishly, or with a delay. An enemy in the overworld may display a graphic for an incoming area of effect ability, and you will sometimes straight up not be able to move your units out simply because they end up moving at half speed for no apparent reason. Or because they're clipping with other units. This makes unit micro nearly impossible. Thankfully, it isn't required to beat the campaign.

All in all, I would recommend this game to anybody who liked Dungeon Keeper or is a fan of God Games or Dungeon Builders in general. Regardless of whether you are the meticulous perfectionist who wants to spend hours building the perfect dungeon, a more tactical player who wants to try various approaches to beating the campaign, or a casual player looking for something new to try: you will enjoy it.

Un toisième opus de qualité, une histoire symapthique avec des dialogues remplis d'humour et de parodie de différents univers.

Les + :

Histoire
Dialogues (Humour, références nombreuses)
Fluidité (pas de baisse de FPS meme avec l'écran plein d'effets)
Graphisme (dessins soignés)

Les - :

La difficulté n'est pas linéaire du tout, trop facile à mon gout dans l'ensemble avec certain achieve pratiquement impossible sans diminuer la difficulté

看成片的赞扬测评买的游戏，玩了近几十小时候，比较失望，感觉不值这个价格。
游戏本身感觉优化不足，遭遇战想刻意晚到最后期，但到后面会卡卡的 需要保存重开游戏（不用质疑我电脑，）
这个游戏，单机就是过过剧情，遭遇战打电脑会略微有些乏味，或许可以：
多添加点难度等级加强敌人进攻手段

再比如丰富地上世界，地牢出口附近的敌人保持现状，但只设置一个邪恶值比较低的井，较远的地方更加难以攻破，但是能获得大量的邪恶值（前期 后期需求邪恶值拉开差距，达到深入地上->发展->继续深入->继续发展）。现在是一开始开口井，憋到后期一波推，就很尴尬

作为一个操作极菜的新手，就是前期接进攻的时候多死了几个兵，但是兵太便宜了，多爆几只就顶过去了。。。。。造兵只要有钱就秒出，这一点我觉得应该改善下，不一定要像老试即时战略一样，花时间造兵，但是可以把提价兵变为一种奢侈品（因为都能复活，后期部落也可以。复活英雄的价格同理）。危机来临时，可以爆几次兵弥补失误，但是连续暴兵拖时间就很无趣了

再就是操作，总感觉这游戏操作深度不够，感觉还不如十几年前的其他游戏，应该是操作精度上的问题，说不清，道不明

就这些，总体还算新颖，不再是人刷副本，变成了副本刷人。本人英文一般，就不翻译了，只是出来比比两句，制作方看不看得到并不怎么在乎

35984905.review:
哈哈哈哈哈哈......hahahahahaha........
      不得不说，这是一款非常好玩的游戏。
      这款游戏的模式非常有趣，虽然不少人说是借鉴了地下城守护者那种挖墙造地下城的风格，不过，这款游戏本身也是特色鲜明的。
首先，它分为地下和地上两种环境，在地上进攻同时在地下进行建设和防守，这种双线操作的模式让你必须考虑地上和地下的兵力部署，和环境分配，可以说对我而言，这种模式对于伟大至尊而言很有代入感。
      另外，地上操作也有其独特之处。这里强调一点，其实这款游戏的快捷键有其人性化的一面，在地面，F1选择英雄，F2全选单位，F3选近战，F4选远程，的确是个方便的设计。
     最后，这游戏的战役剧情和旁白很....谐，很会玩梗。当你前往被续作之力隔开的大陆，将推斯特姆，多拉兰，湖畔镇化为焦土，让汉堡亡中亡，被圣骑士塔诺斯化为焦土的风暴城，以及在旁白中听说因为怀疑瘟疫而被塔诺斯摧毁的斯蛋索姆的时候，真心有点让人感到世事无常

35984175.review:
Сразу оговорюсь, что не играл ни в первую ни во вторую часть этой игры, однако играл в 1 и 2 Dugeon Keeper, коим судя по всему вдохновлялись создатели игры (что они и не скрывают, в местных диалогах постоянно мелькают отсылки).

Итак, посмотрев пару стимов, взглянув в описание, решил попробовать сыграть в эту игру. По стилистике подземелья мне она напомнила старый добрый Dugeon Keeper, что собственно и являлось основной причиной покупки, так как игры "Зло это хорошо" в свое время оставили след в неокрепшей детской психике. 

В далекой-далекой галактике зло победило. И стало ему... Скучно. Исследовав карту мира, видимо кто-то подарил злу глобус, оно ВНЕЗАПНО обнаружило новый континент и решило его покорить. Но что-то пошло не так... Собственно такова завязка сюжета кампании игры. Хорошая картинка, озвучка, неплохие шутейки, вагон отсылок к классике как игр, так и литературы. Стеб над всевозможными клише. Неплохо. Очень неплохо. Но... Как и злу, мне стало скучно уже на 2 миссии. Нет динамики, да и зла на самом деле нет. Подземелье все больше и больше напоминало песочницу. Я вроде плохой, а вроде и не особо. Игра пыталась совместить жанр РТС и стратегии непрямого управления. На мой взгляд у нее это вышло не очень хорошо. В итоге игра на любителя. Не плохая, нет, вовсе нет, даже хорошая. Но на любителя.

Плюсы:
1) Зло это хорошо
2) Сюжет
3) Шутки, стеб и прочее-прочее
4) Собственное подземелье с орками и гоблинами
5) Красивая эльфийка в помошницах
6) Совместная игра

Минусы:
1) Красочная, мультяшная картинка не ассоциируется со злом
2) Ваши монстры вовсе не выглядят монстрами. Так, май-литл-пони, только зеленого цвета
3) Отсутствие динамики
4) Неудачное совмещение прямого и непрямого управления
5) Нет мрачности. Нет зла. Все вылизано до состояния мультяшности
6) Бесячий рассказчик. Не понимаю, откуда пришла эта мода. Но все чаще вместо того что-бы показывать, нам рассказывают что-либо. Ладно если-бы это было РПГ. Но это стратегия.

Как итог. Я не знаю рекомендовать или нет игру. Возьмите, поиграйте, если не понравится - оформите возврат. Игра, повторюсь, неплоха. Но когда становится скучно на 2 миссии ко 2 часу игры это не к добру.

35982653.review:
Great game. Really. As many others, I am an original Dungeon Keeper fan. And I as many others bought the first Dungeons 1 hoping to relive some of the magic from Dungeon Keeper, and was greatly disappointed. I skipped Dungeons 2 for the same reason, but decided to give this version a shot due to the positive reviews.

And finally! They nailed it! The feeling in this game comes really close to my original Dungeon Keeper experience. Its not the same game. But close enough. The humor is there. The creatures and pathetic heroes are there. The narrator and the sarcastic tone of the game is nothing short of perfect. Graphics are good, sound is good, all with lots of attention to detail. Gameplay is excellent, and the game is well balanced, actually requiring you to employ a strategy, when you build your dungeon.

Controls are a little wobbly at times, but I play at an old slightly underspec'ed laptop. It doesn't really bother me, as the original Dungeons Keeper was wobbly as well (I also played that on a slightly underspec'ed computer). Don't go to low, though.

I can greatly recommend this game. If you're a Dungeon Keeper fan, this is as close as it gets.

35975843.review:
Le Mal absolu était contrarié. D'une part, il n'y avait absolument rien d'intéressant à regarder à la télé, d'autres parts, les chaînes d'infos lui prouvaient que l'on avait absolument pas besoin de lui pour rendre le monde épouvantable. Las, il éteignit son écran 5000 pouces qu'il s'était offert pour compenser ces âges de vaches maigres (offert pendant un pillage en bonne et due forme suite à un ouragan: une période propice pour s'offrir de l'électroménager alors qu'il n'y a même plus d'électrécité). il savait que si les choses continuaient de cette manière, il serait durement malmené à la prochaine réunion des actionnaires. Du temps jadis, on bouffait les récalcitrant à la croque au sel. Mais non, maintenant il fallait être moderne, proposer des nouvelles manières de pourrir les gens, sinon on finirait par le remplacer par cette énorme souris...  Il lança son compte steam pour un jeu en ligne durant lequel il espérait faire des commentaires désobligeants sur les skills de ses adversaires ou coéquipiers, histoire de noircir leurs âmes et sauver du coup cette journée, lorsque Dungeons III (DIII) apparu. Le Mal était perplexe. Il songea à tous les avatars maléfiques qu'il a jusque là incarné: un fonctionnaire pénible qui refusait de réunir les familles par respect du règlement (Paper Please), un concierge perfide qui nourrissait sa famille grâce au chantage (Beholder) ou encore même, Gandhi. Mais jamais, au grand jamais, il n'avait incarné un Maître du Mal à l'Ancienne (MMA) du genre à employer des crétins surveillant le mavais côté de la porte ou chauffant les oreilles des elfes au rouge.  Il y avait finalement de l'espoir pour aujourd'hui, y compris pour les forces des ténèbres et mes jeux de mots bidons.

Le Mal  S.A.:

Ici foin de golden boys gobelins visant à pervertir la vertu inébranlable des marchés mondiaux ou de stratagèmes prouvant le bien-fondé aux étudiants de devenir des activistes pro-zombies. DIII fait dans la tradition familiale du Dungeon Keeper, on construit un donjon souterrain et on amasse suffisament d'or pour appâter des aventuriers dans le but de faire un barbecue de leurs restes. Pour les habitués du management maléfique, vous n'allerz pas avoir trop de problème: creuser des tunnels, construire des succursales, employer du petit personnel, développer son activité et construire de gros objets contendants contre les militants écolo qui investiraient vos locaux pour une action d'éclat. La petite touche "bizness" de cette série de jeu allemand consiste, comme son origine l'indique à investir et occuper massivement les territoir...euh les marchés étrangers de la surface: le Mal, qui en a assez de respirer continuellement la transpi des orcs, et pour peu d'air frais, est prêt à faire des échanges commerciaux particulièrement fructueux en coup de hache et boule de feu dans un public ciblé mais pas très réceptif à vos arguments. Oui, en des termes plus terre à terre, une fois que vous aurez dessoudez le paladin venu piller votre donjon grâce à votre gourdin dernier cri, vous pourrez envoyer vos orcs essayer celui-ci sur les bergères resteées à la surface (ainsi que sur les bergers pour ne pas faire de jaloux)et menez une OPA (littéralement) incendiaire sur les fermes. Le donjon se manageant en temps réel vous êtes libre de faire de l'embauche immédiate dans une main d'oeuvre qualifiée que forment les démons et les mort-vivants, qui vous aideront à voire plus grand dans votre développement et vous donneront ainsi une image auprès de vos ennemis de leadership fort, ouvert au multiculturalisme et à l'innovation plutôt qu'un simple chef de horde, prêt à envoyer ses orcs au casse-pipe dans l'espoir de ne pas les payer en fin de mois histoire de maintenir un carnet des comptes sain.

Docteur Es Maleficarum:

Toujours prêt à exhiber une histoire riche en tradition, le fond du fond de DIII est le fin du fin de l'Heroic-fantasy: vous êtes le Mal, un grand type en armure. Le Mal, certes, mais un mâle nécessaire sans lequel ce jeu n'aurais jamais fait parti de la série que nous connaissons actuellement. Suintant le charisme à grosse gouttes sous son heaume et toujours pas débarassé de son esprit de libre entrepreneur, celui-ci s'est pourtant quelque peu désisté de sa place pour cet épisode. Comme la marque de tous les grands chefs, il délègue tout son travail à une jeune stagiaire, Thalya. Déterminé à pourrir les dimanches ensoleillés des palloufs, le MMA envoie la jeune fille faire ce qu'elle sait faire le mieux: le ménage (oui, le Mal aime courroucer les féministes). Il faut reconnaitre que le scénario ne trouve pas de réel justificatif que "tiens une licornne ar-en-ciel! je croyais l'espèce éteinte! Faisons la exploser!" car généralement, quiconque vous rencontrez dans les jeux vidéos mérite forcément une boule de feur de derrière-les-fagots: le mal tape sur ce qui ne correspond pas à ses critères et généralement un paladin en fait autant.Si vous persistrez à vouloir de quoi il en retourne, songez à votre MJ qui vous pondais un scénario ne tenait qu'àun fil risible, et que, hilare, il la sciemment gonflé avec tous les clichés du genre, histoire de vous donner une folle envie de vous défouler sur les PNJs jusqu'au plus innocent. Cependant,Thalya, déterminée à devenir le nouveau mal dominant (nan j'ai pas honte) mais frappée d'un atavisme zolien, ne manque pas de charme en apprentie Reine du mal balance des insanités ridicules sous les vannes du narrateur. Moi je l'adore pour la simple raison qu'elle peut rapidement devenir mon unité la plus puissante, et que comme tous les stagiaires, je n'aurais jamais à la payer.
hého, ne l'a plaignez pas, je lui assure sa formation...


Dungeons III: Reign Of Chaos:

Si ce sous-titre vous rappelle quelque chose, alors félicitation: vous êtes vieux. Mais encore, DIII est un jeu qui cache sans honte ses influences, tant pour son aspect que pour son gameplay. DIII a copié des recettes qui marchent, et si aucune grande compagnie du jeu vidéo ne s'est décidé à envoyer aux développeurs une visite de Monsieur Brodequin, c'est parce que ceux-ci ont sur apposé leur marque." Ca a le goût de", "ça ressemble à" mais ce n'est rien d'autre que DIII. C'est une recette que l'on sera capable de vous servir ad vitam sans que pour autant vous en aillez la nausée à la condition que vous le prenez pour ce qu'il est: à savoir un gros défouloir, pas aussi créatif qu'un Evil genius, mais plus accessible; la crème de la crème de la Dark Fantasy, dans tout ce qu'elle peut avoir de plus lourdingue certes , mais tout à fait consciente de ce qu'elle est. C'est du mal pouët-pouët et ça fait du bien.


Parfois, je me demandais si DIII n'est pas l'épisode 4 perdu de la série Wacraft, dont les héros, abandonnés par leurs créateurs trop occupés maintenant à vendre des émotes hors de prix, auraient donné libre cours à leurs mauvais instinct. On ne va pas crier au génie non plus , mais DIII marche sur les plates bandes des classiques avec des grosses bottes en fer et donne volontiers des coups de pieds dans les jolis chateaux de sable des licenses bien établies avec un certain talent. Le jeu pourra être oublié dans votre bibliohèque puis être relancer avec plaisir, histoire d'une joie simple comme un collier en oreilles de nain.
Si le jeu est en occaz, foncez, vous ferez toujours une meilleure affaire qu'avec une autre série de jeu de combat historique-mais-maintenant-converti-à-la-dark-fantasy: eux pratiquent un capitalisme qui m'épate, parce que moi, si j'arnaquais les gens, je ferais semblant de leur donner quelque chose.

35970462.review: Scratches that Dungeon Keeper itch quite nicely. Give this a try if you liked the original Dungeon Keeper. It's kind of a strange cross between Warcraft 3 and DK. You build a dungeon with the goal of destroying the heroes of the land, but you can also send your monsters topside and it turns into an RTS-lite where you can go around killing creeps for EXP and a currency called "evilness". I'm about halfway through the campaign which is quite enjoyable so far and plays out a lot like Blizzard's RTS games where each map has a gimmick and you're given new units and rooms that you can use to overcome the gimmick. 35968613.review:
Those who played Dungeons 2 will be disappointed in unit variety (no more upgrades for Nagas and absence of trolls). However, this is somewhat offset with the good ol torture system seen in Dungeon Keeper games. Factions from the previous game are combined into one here (so you can go crazy with unit compositions like Demon + Undead etc). 

Campaign is long and we're talking about 20 missions. Be warned though, if you're OCD like me, each mission can take 2-3 hours for about 16 or so missions. The dialogue is also nonsensical and cheesy but charming in its own way. Those who played Dungeons 2 will be pleased to know the humor is the same but ramped up to eleven. 

Skirmish mode really offers only 1 map (you can only choose the size of it) but compensates for it with randomly generation, no skirmish game is the same every play.

There's no matchmaking for multiplayer however so players will have to find a group of friends to play with.

It's a good game overall and hope that Realmforge continue to improve the game and develop DLC that adds new rooms and units.

And now for a challenge I pose to those daring enough:

Take a shot everytime the Narrator or Thalya mentions the word 'Evil'

35965987.review:
Just finished the main campaign, spent over 90 hours in the beta. Fantastic game, 

PROS: The story is just as wonderful and cheezy as in Dungeons 2, the missions are a bit more varied (while still letting you play at your own pace for the most part), and the new tech tree is a great addition to the game. The graphics and animations are a step up over Dungeons 2 (and I love the soundtrack too). Overall, really enjoying the game.

CONS: The interface is still a bit rough at times, particularily compared to Dungeons 2, you can't find units as quickly, Detaching the hand of evil from the cursor was an odd choice, at first it was very disorienting to have this hand flying around after the cursor. After a while, I just ignored it, but the actual cursor was so small I occasionally lost it on the screen in all the action. There were a few minor bugs in my playthrough, but nothing gamebreaking.

OVERALL: If you liked Dungeon Keeper 2, War for the Overworld or Dungeons 2, or just like rts/base-building games, you'll like Dungeons 3.

35960610.review:
玩了这个游戏也有一段时间了，主战役虽然没有拿到满成就但也是通关了，下面我就说说我对这游戏的看法吧！
      我没玩过之前的，直接入手的三，所以对于前作我没了解，我也不知道他是进步了还是退不了又或者原地踏步！
      但就我而言，对于这个游戏我是很满意的，画面、音乐这些就不说了，操作方面地表上和魔兽的操作没多大差别，但地表下的还是有点不足，无法选择全部人，虽然可以f2直接拉起全部人又或者右键点击敌人全部攻击它，但还是和全部选中有点差别的，当然这无伤大雅。还有就是有时候书、魔力会被墙遮挡，要很费劲才能拿到，还有就是仍人的时候只能一个一个的扔，当然，这也有可能是我没找到快捷键。
     加分项（最让我满意的就是游戏的旁白和女主之间的对话了，贼有意思，剧情战役不仅不磨人反而变成一种享受了。）
     扣分项（当玩完战役后再玩遭遇战，我发现我玩不下去了，因为厌倦了，旁白虽然还在但远没有那么有趣了，之所以出现这样的原因，我觉得还是这游戏的格局太小了，至尊、魔王、大陆、女神，这些元素加在一起给人的感觉应该是十分宏大的，但这个游戏这方面就感觉有点不上档次了。简单来说吧！就像是荣耀战魂一样，三个种族的战争，可剧情战役出现的战士就那么点人，感觉有点假，但荣耀战魂毕竟还是以线上对战为主，所以这方面不影响体验。）还有一点就是，打到后期就很无趣了，就是拉兵、右键，一路平推，很多东西都不需要研究的，本来研究因素都不多，这一下更是将这个游戏的可玩性缩短了。（比如金币和魔力还有酒桶，你完全可以把房间建大一点不研究他们，反正我每回战役结束，地下城至少有一半的面积没用，而且士兵是有上限的，单算数量加起来也就3、40个，而且绝大多时候一二十个兵就能平推了，尤其是你先把复活建筑都建好的时候。）
     至于多人模式我没玩过，因为没有玩这个的朋友，所以我也不知道到底是什么样的，所以此项意见保留。
     总评：很好的一款游戏，至少我觉得能值这个价格，但战役完结就没有玩下去的欲望了（格局太小、因素太少。）
     希望下回制作商能多加点经费，把它做大点，最好是把格子这种取消（因为就像模拟城市和城市天际线的差别一样，前者总感觉太小。），当然这是我一家之见，有些地方还是多多包涵了。

35959325.review:
Having come to this game as a veteran of both Dungeon Keeper and War for the Overworld, I was at first quite pleased to find a similar game.  Unfortunately my pleasure quickly ebbed when I began to play the campaign for Dungeons 3.

The storyline and humor are clearly meant for children only, which comes as a grave dissappointment to a fan who had expected the dark humor of similar games in this genre.  What's more, there is a LOT of this poor quality storyline and narration jam packed into every campaign scenario.  It quickly causes the campaign to become unplayable simply because it's not worth it to sit through all the awful jokes and crummy voice acting.

The game itself is passable.  You will find all the things you would expect from something in this genre:  workers, grunts, demons, traps, and over-zealous heroes to kill.  Unfortunately there is no option to possess your soldiers, a feature I've long considered to be a distinguishing mark for this type of game.  Control of your warriors on the overworld map is done in the more direct fashion seen in games like Starcraft and Warcraft rather than by rally flags.  Control in the underworld is managed through relocating soldiers using the hand of evil, and by assigning monsters as guards in guardrooms.  The graphics are very dated, likely intentionally reminiscent of Warcraft III.

Overall not worth the rather hefty price tag.  If we ignore the horrible campaign and just focus on the game itself, I would price it as an indie title perhaps around $15.
