35771236.review:
Dungeons 1 and 2 weren't that good for me, but this one is a lot better. Think of it as a mixture of Warcraft 3 and Dungeon Keeper. The Dungeon management is enjoyable, especially playing in coop. Yes it has coop, coop is seriously everywhere, you can even play the tutorials in coop. In coop you manage one dungeon together while trying to progress in the campaign. Overworld gameplay has improved a lot and I got reminded of good old RTS games.

I played the weekend nothing else but this game, mostly coop but sometimes solo. The characters are funny, the story is very sarcastic and I enjoyed every minute so far (haven't even completed the campaign yet).

The only real downside, which isn't really a major issue is multiplayer (not coop). It is funny up to 4 players, but reaching the winning goal is way to fast and easy, we need more game modes.

If you played Dungeons 1 and 2 before and were disappointed, you still should give this one a try.

35771168.review:
前作因为语言障碍玩即删，这次有中文总算可以用邪恶势力殴打正义联盟了XD
1.可能过了那个阶段，邪恶的说书人没那么吸引我，但对那些玩惯了正义勇者的玩家应该很有吸引力（年轻的玩家务必一睹邪恶派的叙事风格，这是很难得的体验）。
2.原本我对兵种的设想是单选一种就可以扫平天下了，但没想到兵种是有递进关系的，初期部落，中期亡灵，后期恶魔。部落的单位非常实用，中期英雄们变强我方可能死亡，所以做墓穴可以复活阵亡单位，另外僵尸可以看做是焦油陷阱（存炮灰），之后的科技走向……我又没玩到后面，不知不知不知道~~~
3.建筑都是以2*2，3*3这种规律生效的，格子数数好，如果视角能拉高点就好了。
4.城主百科全书里都有写，别在英雄前进的路上建通往金库的路，他们捡了等于永远消失（emm吃过亏）
5.跟大多数即时战略一样，Ctrl+F？是编队，双击一个单位全选同类单位。
6.好像用第一视觉跟魅魔小姐姐嬉戏~~~~

35770618.review:
游戏本身不能说多神，但是游戏内的吐槽实在是不能更赞，尤其对于牛蛙西木暴雪时代的玩家来说简直就像是自己的心里话被说出来了一样，而且原生中文的翻译质量绝对过硬，光冲这个态度就值回票价。感谢和我一起长大的制作者哈哈。

不过既然是评测还是要谈一谈游戏本身。BETA版玩得比较多正式版还没怎么开始，如果有偏差还请谅解。总体来说本作是延用了牛蛙地下城的模版，在前作的基础上进行了完善，去除了比较鸡肋的第一人称之类的部分，增添了地表战斗部分。个人觉得还是比较成功的。

兵种体系被首度分成了三系，使得怪物的管理体系更清晰了，地下城建设和经营感觉比前作要简单明了。不过新增了地面部分之后玩家的关注点增加导致游戏难度获得了平衡。特别值得称赞的是游戏内的细节表现，比如不同房间墙壁的风格设计，怪物的反应，以及一些很恶搞的地方比如罢工的食人魔在地表战斗中不上去打站在后面举牌子，特么的不愧是泰坦单位泥马牌子都要举两个？！

不足的部分，新增的地表部分相对来说还比较简陋，UI设计方面还不是非常顺手。另外不知道前作很精彩的地牢攻坚战本作还有没有，毕竟挖着挖着突然挖到敌人老家的原玩法还是很有趣的。

35767693.review:
Dungeons 3 suffers from what i like to call:
5 steps forward 3 steps back(or 2 steps sidewards if you will)

The game does have some improvements overs its predececors but not enough to justify buying it at full price.

The good:
More rooms for your dungeons.
The ability to turn heroes into your minnions.

The bad:
Thalya.
She doesnt add anything to the game.
That is pretty much her only crime.
Being compleetly meaningless.

The narrator: see thalya.

The factions have been merged into one big factions.
And lost there uniqueness in the progress.

Many units have been lost.
Remember naga archers?
Remember gnome bards, druids, unicorns, etc.
Remember tentical doors or minnions?
These are all gone.

I cant recommend buying this game over dungeons 2 unless it is for sale.

My advice:
Get dungeons 2 over dungeons 3 and only buy dungeons 3 when on sale if you liked dungeons 2.
Because at the moment of this writting.
The game is just inferior to its predecesor.

Incredibly fun game!
If you played the good old Dungeon Keeper games in the 90ies, then this is for you. It follows the original DK game in spirit, but is not a total remake. 35766709.review: Base management, leading a small army to fight the good guys. Yes you read that right, I said the good guys. In this game you ARE the bad guys and your job is to spread EEEVVILLL however you can in this, amazingly breath of fresh air I have not seen befoer this one, 3rd person camera game. Granted I only have a few hours under my belt and like 2 campaign missions, but I know that this game is just getting started.

35766385.review: Good clean fun. Humor is tasteful and parodies known titles in the current day and age. Enjoying it quite a bit, Campaign wise, and looking forward to trying out the Skirmishes and such.

35766294.review: Perhaps the most suprisingly exceptional game I have played this year. The game builds upon the previous hit "Dungeon Keeper" and takes it to the next level by adding the actual confrontation with the "Good" overworld. The dungeon part is really immersive with great enhancements for each room and unit type. Conquering the "good" overworld is a great addition where you get more diversity over the bare Dungeon game. Graphics are great with a cartoony feeling that change depending on your evil corruption from bright and sunny to dark and moody. I experienced zero bugs so far (10 hours so far) and zero lag. Overall a great gaming experience. My favourite part is the humour throughout the game, where the narrator and oftentimes the main protagonist, break the fourth wall. The only downside I found is that it is on the expensive side. I highly recommnend the game!

闻达莉娅呻吟于地牢，至尊惊奇，
推门视之，
一人、一桌、一椅、一扇、一抚尺而已。

========================================
DK的精神续作，旁白骚话多，花式自黑，很喜欢这样的风格。中文翻译质量可以接受，能看出制作组对中文市场的重视。还有很大的提升空间，希望DLC内容进一步丰富。
几点问题：
1.开始界面，背景移动太快，严重晃眼。
2.游戏中左边栏完全没必要隐藏，隐藏起来反而很不方便。
3.画质选项不要隐藏起来，要让玩家有完全控制权。虽然现玩家在自己修改cfg文件后也可实现画面调整，但还是太麻烦了。

35762804.review:
I haven't put many hours into this game as I write this review, but here goes anyway.  I would recommend this game for people who like the genre.  This genre isn't for everyone, but if they're interested enough to be reading the reviews I figure they're going to like playing this one.  I know this game has officially launched and there is enough content to justify it as a finished game, but I still feel there is more room for expansion in the premise and execution of the game.

Likes:
Humor - I love the humor brought to this game.  It is deeper and more prevalent than the humor used in previous games of the type.  (I'm still a bit uneasy referring to this as a genre, but more on that later.)  I seldom finish the campaign modes in the other games like this, but the humor is actually enticing enough to make me want to see what they are going to say next in each successive mission.  I might actually finish the campaign in this one.

Graphic Art - Very well done.  I see a lot of good things in this game.  DK2 was breakthrough for its time as a novel concept, but the art was admittedly lackluster.  They made up for it with some rather nice video cutscenes after each level, but you don't spend hours staring at the cut scenes so having a pleasant viewing experience is definitely a plus.

Characterization - Something new to the genre and I like it.  Pretty much the only character you had to relate to in previous games was the narrator.  (Not that this was a bad thing, as there have been some pretty cool narrators for this type of game so far.)

Dislikes:
Better physics - The ragdoll effect for the heroes getting tossed about is nice, but the legs tend to go everywhere and while I might look like a sadist in saying this, as I was watching the heroes get tortured I couldn't help but notice the limbs would stick out at funny angles and it kind of ruined the effect.  This needed a bit more polish.

Is it really a genre? - I've only seen a few games like the old DK series which for me sort of got it all started.  For me though for it to classify as a genre you have to 1) hold to a common central theme and mechanics, and 2) you have to show enough original material to set yourself apart from others in what you are calling a genre or else you come off as nothing but a bunch of carbon copy clones of each other with now originality.  This game does well with the first point keeping a lot of the same mechanics from the other games in the genre, but it lacks anything very original.  It comes off as a carbon copy of other games of it's type (albeit with improved humor, characterization, graphics, etc.).  I had my hopes up high when I saw that the levels were randomly generated.  Having seen this now it isn't much to crow about yet.

So for me, Three Likes minus Two Dislikes still equals Recommend.

Stuff I would like to see in either DLC or further titles in the series:
Overworld buildings - Not many, but if you had something like an Orc Camp you could build next to your overworld assets where you could place things like the war drum or a watch tower it would make for some interesting strategies.  Other intersting ideas: dungeon entrances (a similar concept to the demonic portal, only persistent with the downside being heroes can invade through it.  

More enslavement spells or rooms.  The randomly generated rooms with worms, dragons, and spiders, are nice.  Having a creature species or room that allows taming of these beasts would be awesome.  Process flow would be - Discover mother dragon, build creature pen, defeat dragon, snots drag to pen, drop in the taming room, horde member tames dragon, New creature to play with.

Terrain - One thing I see lacking in this game that I have seen in others is the use of terrain.  The dungeon zone in this game seems somewhat limited.  Other games offer underground lakes, lava pits, chasms, and the like.  I find the dungeon zones here somewhat basic.  I would like to see a map where you need to hop back and forth from overworld to dungeon to reach your goal.  There doesn't really seem to be a correlation between above ground and dungeon maps except at the entrance.

Creature dependent rooms - Not only do I think having certain creatures working specific rooms to be nice, I think that having a certain creature in your arsenal before you can build certain rooms/machines works too.  Especially when teamed with building overworld buildings.  As with the mechanics above for taming creatures something like - tame spider, train spider up to level four to promote to mother spider, send mother spider to overworld, sacrifice mother spider to create a spider nest which spawns (unconctrolled) baby spiders peridoically to harass nearby heroes.

Creature flavor:  I view the horde as basic units.  I tried skipping them to work with only units from other factions and it doesn't work very well.  I think "flavoring" horde units to a preferred faction would be fun.  This would also work if you install the ability to tame ambient creatures.  I could be as cosmetic as a different skin with a name/prefix change (undead orc/demonic orc, bone dragon/dark drake), or as a power boost to the unit.

All around, excited to see what the future holds for the game.

A.A. :)

35760481.review:
Dungeons 3 was a fantastic continuation of the series. If you havent played Dungeons 2 go pick it up or wait for a sale and see if you like it. If you have played it and like it pick this up, its worth it.


[h1]What I Liked:[/h1]

    This game felt like a more polished Dungeons 2. They took care of alot of the minor annoying things from the previous game and added some fun new things for us all to play around with. All the enemies feel way more balanced and less of a drag to play against. No more stupid trap disarming gnome, the neutral monsters both in the overworld and underworld were no longer crazy powerful...etc. They kept the humor and references to other media, and the story was alright and lasted a solid length of time. The base game was easy, but they have a tougher difficulty for those who find it too easy. Overall the game was well worth the price tag, and I'm looking forward to the DLC.

[h1]What I was dissapointed with:[/h1]

    First the game doesnt really do anything new. Like I said above this game is alot like Dungeons 2, so much so that calling it dungeons 2.5 wouldnt be that far from the mark. Sure we get to control all three factions at a single time, and yes there is a new story, but there isnt much else new. I mean would it have hurt to change the units? Would it have been bad to give us new or different rooms? The units are pretty much standard from the previous game. They added one or two we havent seen and took away one or two from each faction. The rooms are also pretty much the same. all the spawn rooms, the rooms we need for upgrading past a certain level and then the one or two that are new like the Gobblers and the Arcanum.

    Second, the narrator doesnt talk as much. Thalia and the narrator only talk a few times per mission and it feels alot more lonely than it did before. Having the narrator pop in and tell me about my beer or make fun of me for letting the objective through was one of my favorite parts of the game. They know that this happens too because later in the missions the narrator comments on it. I know some people hated the narrator, but just give people the option to turn him off or tell them to STFU. Most of the negative reviews that I read based on the narrator was because people were butthurt he would make fun of them when they failed, but the game is so easy I'm not sure why there would be any other response aside from git gud.

    There are a handful of other small annoyances. Like two missions didnt involve dungeons at all and completely focused on the above world combat. This part of the game is completely lame IMO and lacks any strategic value. You can and probably should just invest in a single factions unit and completely steamroll through any enemy. The addition of mechanics in the overworld feels clunky at best. Mob aggro is sometimes funky and you can lose a troop or two do to them wanting the butt somewhere unsafe. That being said nothing in this game makes me feel dissapointed in buying it.

35759981.review:
Great game as I thought it would be. A well-built successor to Dungeons 2.
Though, there are a few cons that I would like to mention - but there are so much that is good about this game so these cons don't weight the game down at all.

PROS: 1. You'll never have a dull moment in this game. There's always something going on.
2. The humour..... Oh the humour!
3. All the references from other games and/or movies. It's so good!

Minor CONS:

1. -The building/researching menus feel a bit clunky and way too big.
2. -There should be an in-game clock to show you how long you've been playing.
3. -If you right-click a room in the building menu then the camera should switch to that room if you have it active.
Just to be certain that you don't build a room twice.
4. -There should be a way to see the stats of your selected minion/hero. It should also display what kind of power
said minion/hero got from the books except for just the name.

Overall, these are just minor stuff pointed out. The game is well worth my money and the humour in it is priceless.
I've had lots of fun in Dungeons 2 and I can see that I will have lots of fun in Dungeons 3 (especially if they patch the minor irritating moments that I've pointed out :p )

35758244.review:
I might sound biast, since i have loved the series since Dungeons (the first one) 

The third game is more like the second game, which is if Warcraft and Dungeon Keeper had a baby and forgot it somewhere in a cave and made it grew up by small little slaves, that thought it was their master.

Its a great game, the RTS element is fluid, but it isnt advanced (which can be taken as a bad thing or good, depending on what you prefer) BUT You are able to micro, which is always a good thing. Its responsive and it has a good speed in the game, so things doesnt take forever and it doesnt really get done in seconds. 

This makes it easier for newer people to actually play it.
There is a coop in the game which i have yet to try (need friends for that)

The dungeon aspect of the game is what you would expect, you build/expand and train units.

The game has alot of referenses which is always fun, the story itself is quite a joyride, i have laughed out loud most of the time on stream. 

Id recommend it, wont rate a 0-10 since i just hate that scoring system. And 30 Eur isnt really much to spend on a game you can have 100+ hours of fun with.

35755301.review:
Dungeons 1 was weak, Dungeons 2 was somewhat better, Dungeons 3 nailed it.
It's a great game. Some say it is better than Dungeon Keeper 2 and improves upon it, but I would NOT go as far.
It is fun and entertaining, it is cool it breaks the 4th wall and is not all too serious - but I think they went way overboard with this, just... Too much. But that is personal opinion.
It does seem somewhat repetetive, as opposed to Dungeon Keeper games, where starting a new dungeon was always fun for some reason.
The coop is rather basic and there is no lobby system, the search for partner I think so far works only in Duel, and in other modes you compete in ammount of "evileness" and have to scout the live lobby chatter to punch room number by hand... Very strange and odd.

But that aside, the game works flawlessly. 
~140 FPS on a 144hz monitor, despite literally no settings in options.

Game parodies Warcraft and LOTR a lot, which I think is very entertaining. Does not create any bond with characters, because it straight out tells you everything is a generic placeholder thing to kill (that's why I said they went overboard).
In such way they lessen the "evilness" of the overall game. Dark rooms of DK, screams from torture chambers and convincing voice acting is not there. It's just the narration to the mechanics you are going to repeat over and over again.

Thankfully the core of the game is very solid. The undeground part we know from DK and above it's simple RTS (without attack move command? argh...)

Still I would give it a solid 8/10. I've mostly focused on the criticism, just so nobody would feel cheated.
Digging corridors is always fun :)

35752551.review:
Full Disclosure - I received this game free as part of a sponsored campaign to show gameplay on my YouTube channel. However, there was no obligation for me to leave any Stream review. I'm doing this on my own with my own opinions.

Dungeons 3 is a fun and hilarious RTS game. It combines a lot of elements from various game types into a complex RTS game without the stress and fatigue that some other games can create. The story telling in the campaign is full of cheesy lines and various pop culture and other game references that I think everyone can get a giggle out of.

The Skirmish mode can be played solo and coop, and has a few modes including basic skirmish where you have to defeat a boss, endless which lets you play pretty much infinitly, and survive that challenges you to survive 20 waves of enemy heros. 

Overall, Dungeons 3 really entertains me because it feels so well polished. The graphics, the sound fx, even the writing for text descriptions gives me the feeling like they were having a lot of fun making the game so we too would have lots of fun playing it. 

Even though I recieved the game for free, I would happily have purchased it myself. At 40$, it's not overpriced and worth your time. :)

Happy Gaming!

35749760.review:
The Dungeons series to me had first had quite the rocky start... I was looking for something to fix my dungeon making desires ever since the beloved DK of old. The Dungeons 1 however provided a completely different experience with quite an empty setting. The system of making your dungeon to the visitors needs before slaying them was an original concept, but not what I was after.

The sequel was met with some sceptical glance from me, but I saw they had picked up a heavy warcraft 3 tone for the war above ground and created a more functioning playful art style that though was parody to others in the genre, certainly looked better than the original games design. This direction was a more better experience and I had hours of fun with Dungeons 2 for its slower more relaxed pace of action. The expansion pack had a fun Game of Thrones parody and the new faction of undead was incredibly fun to play. Enjoyed everything it had to offer though like all parody game aspects the insults and gests can soon get outdated as the game goes on.

Dungeons 3... Now once again the parody element is clear and the direction so far is very fun! completed the first few levels and enjoying the cute themes of good getting crushed by evil. The game lacks identity in some respect but thats mainly down to the mish mash concepts of Warcraft and Dungeon Keeper blended with parodies from any popular fantasy movie/game. The dungeon building is solid and supplies many rooms, the team has been fleshed out to contain all the factions in one and makes me excited to think of how they will approach adding features in any DLC.

I have always enjoyed supporting the Dungeon series as I have only seen it get better as time goes on. The Co-Op Campaign makes playing this with a friend incredibly fun especially when both players prefer a more calm time-limit to the missions and working together at their own pace. I recommend this game to any fan of the Dungeon building genre or any of the RTS fans that want something fun and constructive without the stress of micro mangement.

All I can add is that perhaps some minor details to the graphics need to quickly get some polish and perhaps some of the rooms not look so complex. Less is more in most cases and detail works better when focused in areas rather than spread across the entire picture.

Looking forward to more from this game and more from the community playing it!

虽然才玩了几个小时，但是强烈推荐！
1.游戏性：8/10 没有刷，没有苟，没有手残和熬时间。简直对我这么中年人太友好！随便玩轻松过关，不过我这种强迫症每次都花大量时间去考虑最佳布局。
2.剧情：8/10 剧情一般不过很欢乐。总之，这旁白真是是神烦级别（别调整频率，旁白才是核心）。中文化的确是用了心的，很多梗！但有些词的语法和双关含义就没翻译出来了。
3.其他:鼠标玩着累，虽然支持手柄，但是手柄操作优化的不太好，而且不能改键。音乐和画面什么的就不评价了。

35749673.review:
Es ist wiedermal ein Gelungender Klassiker von Dungeons. Schon wärend der beta kam ich aus dem schmunzeln und lachen nicht mehr raus, dass Unsagbar grauenhafte Böse wie es wieder alles auf die schippe nimmt und der Erzähler wieder genau so gut ist wie vorher, vieleicht sogar noch besser seit dem er sich aus dem ersten und zweiten teil zum Bösartigen Bösen eingelebt hat.

Ein spiel in dem man mal wieder als Überlegende Böse mit sein schnodderlingen wandeln kann  gehört zu meim wesen. Äonen lang verschloss sich das Böse um zu tüfteln und seine schergen fingen schon an sich zu wundern das es lange keine Bösen streiche mehr bekam oder erniedrigt oder gar geopfert wurde.....was bestimmt mal eine schöne abwechlung war.

Zum spiel selbst kann ich nur eine klare empfehlung geben nachdem ich es jetzt rund mit der beta 30 Stunden gespielt habe.
Es gibt so einige neuerungen und einges alte was wie ich finde super zusammen passt. Die grafik ist völlig ausreichend und besser als zuvor. Ich gebe zu wenn man mal grade nicht hals überkopf versucht irgendwas zu machen schaue ich mir gerne die animationen von gerätschaften an. Einfach super.
Die kisten die man jetzt und vorher produzieren musste werden weiter verarbeitet also baut euere werkstatt und Tüftler nicht zu weit auseinander und macht nicht zu viel auf einmal. Meist fehlt es dann entweder an Gold oder Bösartigkeit.

Mhhh ich liebe es Böse zu sein, die story spornt auch an weiter zu spielen. Auch wenn es nervt war und ist wenn der erzähler immer wieder Brabbelt so hab ich den eindruck obwohl auf  "Häufig" gestellt das sie daran auch etwas gemacht haben.

Es gibt kleinere mankos jaaa.....ABER das sind nur gewöhnungs Bedürftige sachen.

Was toll gewesen wäre wenn man die einheiten im Dungeon besser unterteilen könnte und welche schon in einer Gruppe sind. Obwohl es angezeigt wird welche einheiten im Dungeon oder auf der Oberwelt sind finde ich das es zwischenzeitlich etwas schwierig zu erkennen ist, grade wenn man unter druck steht weil man schon verteidigung laut erzähler haben sollte die man nicht hat und seine Ergebenen Diener zum frass vorwerfen will.

Es sollen größere Karten geben jetzt was mir leider so vorkommt als wären sie gleich und nur die Skalierung gesamt erhöt wurde.Aber ich spiele sowieso immer gerne jedes Level Bis zum schluss und man alles mögliche hat, sich dabei zeit zu lassen finde ich wichtig, ein Level unter zeitdruck zu bestehen oder gar beenden finde ich wiederum nicht so prikelnd, aber bisher geht das ganz gut im spiel.

Pro:
+   Grafik und Animationen
+   UI (User Interface) struckturiert
++ Story und der Erzähler
+   Random Generierte GefechtsKarten
+   Strategische Überlegeung DungeonBau und einheiten anfangs
++ Sound und Musik
+   .........

Kontra:
- Sichtbares Gruppen Management
- Ab und an zu viele Bedürfnis Blasen


Alles in Allem ist das spiel sein Geld wert wer mal wieder Böse sein will und sich fragte bisher warum immer nur das Gute gewinnt obwohl man doch sagt das alles im Gleichgewicht sein würde.
Ich habe schon lange auf ein nachfolger von Dungeons 2 gewartet und bin ganz Happy das es jetzt Dungeons 3 gibt und freue/hoffe schon wieder auf ein 4 Teil :)
Volle punkte von mir als Kauf empfehlung.

35749036.review:
上世纪九十年代，地下城守护者风靡一时，有了不少簇拥者，我即是其中之一。犹记得那种邪恶之心膨胀，肆意玩弄嘲讽践踏各路英雄豪杰并扩张地城的感觉，伴随着当时看起来炫酷的各种3D特效，让我至今怀念。
       偶然间逛G胖商店，看到这地城3，熟悉的画风和熟悉的策略让人眼前一亮，莫非这就是地城守护者的续作？虽然仔细看后发现只是致敬者，但其较为还原的地城经营核心还是很诱人的，更何况说是War3和地城守护者的结合？试想城市天际线的致敬不久青出于蓝而胜于蓝了么，于是不由分说掏钱上船~（时候发现某果居然便宜。。。）
       好了说了一大堆屁话，目前买了半天打了6小时就可以看出这货吸引力有多惊人~虽然容量不大而且很多内容还等待完善，但膨胀的邪恶力量蔓延到地表肆虐的体验还是很令人满意。当完善了地城并严加看管确保讨厌的英雄打不进来，就可以肆意去破坏地表世界啦。游戏首先是很不错的还原了地城守护者的核心内容，并且拓展了地表侵略，操作起来也正如宣传所说，有war3的影子。除了科技升级，兵种杀敌还能获得经验自己升级。清爽的画风，不错的操作，吐槽点满满的CV和旁白，以及各种彩蛋，都是加分项，更何况官方支持简中，也算是良心了（翻译还很好的还原了各种梗~）。最后说说不足处，首先是建模贴图，虽然光影不错，画风不错，但建模贴图还是不像这个年代的游戏，有点五年十年前游戏的感觉；其次是地城内的操作性，部队划分和选择都不是很友好，往往不能快速分组选择（因为左键拾起右键摔下，一定要结合M菜单操作），第三就是兵种等级上限太低；最后就是英雄居然不会升级，在这个很莫名，没有物品也就算了（严格来说有物品，各种奇葩的书籍以及血瓶），但英雄你跟我说只有点科技树升级是什么鬼，还有上限。。。希望随着版本迭代，能够更好的解决这些问题，也能带来更多惊喜~错过了前两作有所遗憾，但还好没有错过这一作~

35748456.review:
I'm enjoying the game a great deal but I feel I have to warn people about the effect it has on your surroundings.

I live in a relatively sturdy 50s era house, I don't tend to have many problems with it, but since playing Dungeons 3 one of the faces of my house has begun to show signs of excessive wear and tear. Just one of them, three of the walls are fine, but the fourth wall is physically crumbling and I'm not sure how long it's going to hold out. Buyer beware.

Edit: whilst it's funnier to leave this as a 'no', I want to boost the metric because I do actually like the game.

A direct improvement from the second game.

While some of the humor and references might seem exceedingly forced, the humor and references are still fun, even cringey, but in a good way. The only real complaint I have, is the co-op being fairly underwhelming. Me and my best friend were sharing one unit on the first level; you also share everything in the dungeon, which just sort of makes for a lot of missed opportunity.

That aside, the game is genuinely fun, and a lot of the issues with the previous game seems to have been addressed.
I definitely recommend this installment in the series.

总结以下几个优点：
1.汉化不错，真心良心，幽默且没什么大的瑕疵。
2.游戏易上手，总体娱乐性不错。
3.对比起2G的大小，游戏内容简直良心。
4.官方响应很快。
缺点：
1.没玩过2，但是对1情有独钟，3的地下城可探索区域太小了。
2.游戏有3个兵种线：部落、亡灵、恶魔。但是每一个都只有2-3钟单位。

35741426.review:
Dungeons 3 est toujours aussi génial à jouer bien que celui ci est bien différent que le second.
Le gameplay à totalement changer et je doit dire que j'ai eu un peu de mal au début car maintenant il n'y a plus de petits icones sur lesquels on cliquaient pour créer , améliorer les salles etc.

Maintenant ce sont des  fenêtres qui apparait. Vous avez par ex celle pour invoquer vos créatures, celle pour construire vos salles, celle pour les pièges etc etc et je doit dire que c'est pour moi un petit point négatif  car du coup ça cache une partie de l'écran voir tous l'écran pour celle de recherche et c'est moins immersif ce qui est peu génant au début. 
Maiss rassurez-vous , on s'y fait très vite et ouvrir les fenêtres avec les touches du clavier devient vite intuitif.

Sinon à part cela que du bon, on retrouve la même voix du narrateur qui est franchement excellente en VF et l'humour est toujours aussi hilarant.

Les graphismes ont eu aussi été améliorer.

je tiens juste à dire un petit coup de gueule sur les personnes qui dénigre ce jeux car il n'est pas comme Dungeon Keeper ou plus récemment War for the Overlord qui s'en rapproche plus.
Heureusement sur steam je ne vois pas ce genre de commentaires mais sur le forum de JVC la c'est permanent .

En même temps le site est réputer pour ces trolls en tous genre.
Enfin ceci pour vous dire je trouve cela complétement stupide de comparer un gameplay qui date de 1997 ou même de le comparer à un jeux du même genre.

Dungeons à sont propre gameplay qui est super addictif pour ceux qui aiment et c'est bien ça qu'on lui demande.

35741075.review:
Dungeons 3 is like Dungeon Keeper but with an added RTS element that turns the game a bit more interesting that a simple base management with a  tower defense element. 
the voice over in this entire game, whether it's on the campaign or on the tutorial is magnificent. the graphical style
of being over cartoony is cool looking and the overall theme of the game is exellent.
My critisim comes with the menus they seem a bit disorganized. managing your army inside the base is a bit cluncky.
Usually i don't use tutorials unless I ccan't find my head and feet in a game, but I did try the tutorial in this game just to give it a try and I was glad I did. The campaign thrusts you into action and you are expected to know everything the tutorial teaches you. for instance what structure you need to feed the troops and how to get it. things that might be self explanitory to some people but not to others.

This is a very enjoyable game

Ну что же, вот и третья часть. Это всё ещё не данжеон кипер, но всё равно - очень хорошая игра. По своей сути это вторая часть умноженая на два. Лучшая графика (приятная глазу) больше сюжета в диалогах, больше юмора, больше абсурда происходящего. 

Отдельно хочу сказать о качестве моделинга, он просто великолепен, например можно рассмотреть рубины глаз кобры посоха наги, или зазубрины на топоре в руках орка, или скажем выпученные глаза у индюшки))

Совертую? Кронечно, без вариантов. 
овермного из 10

35736300.review:
Overall, I really enjoyed the campaign and I am still having fun trying to play some multiplayer. The game has its flaws and I have my suggestions to improve it, but I rate it 7/10 with potential to become even better.

Edit: I am going to add things as I play the game and come to a better review in the end.

Pros:
-Voice Acting
-Narrator
-Comedy
-Style
-Very Dungeon Keeper 2 style
-Converted heroes become evil instead of whiney unhappy pains in the ass 
-Prison riots are not caused by idiot imps overloading prisons anymore (AFAIK). Instead, when a prison is full they just take heroes to graveyards/whatever.
-Converted heroes don't need beds which is economical
-Can rebuild walls so you can really design your own dungeon
-Heroes don't just dig through walls anymore thereby completely bybassing your defenses
-Prisoners that you drop by accident are knocked out instead of immediately fighting
-The developers seem to care
-No more stupid tile claiming nonsense

Cons:
-Not enough workers
-Insanely slow workers
-No real graphics options
-Can't mult-task (i.e. if you are picking up gold, you can't pick up mana or minions, and vice versa)
-No my pet dungeon (sandbox)
-Really slow teching
-As it gets to mid-big size it starts to eat a lot of RAM/processessing
-Converted heroes don't need beds which feels silly and reduces visual variety
-No attack move
-Can't micro control your minions when defending inside your dungeon... which can be pretty fucking critical
-No good vs evil/castle keeper vs dungeon keeper skirmish mode
-No different types of evil heroes to lead your army in skirmish mode (i.e. Absolute Evil instead of Thalya)
-Thalya's level resets back to level 1 every single mission
-Not enough multiplayer modes (amass evilness to win? wtf? and only 8k? and no deathmatch?)

Original Review:
So far, I like it. It's not perfect mechanically, I wish I could use attack move for example, but the dungeon making is fun like it was in Dungeon Keeper 2 so far and the narrator and style is all fun.

+教程完善
+UI精致、模型细腻
+动画丰富，特效华丽。（细节多但是一点都不卡，优化要上天）
+配音生动，文字描述和配音里埋着各种影视、动漫、游戏的梗，非常有意思。

缺点
-难度曲线有点陡峭,一开始巨难,后面躺着打
-地上的部分有点鸡肋  按照现有设定地下是塔防游戏,地上是RTS游戏,但是地上没有技能,只可以框框A,战略就体现在红血了拖走下一个? 更重要的是地上地下两套交互,比如吃个经验书的操作方法都不一样,凭空增加理解成本,却没有实际意义
-数值上有bug
-大后期感觉还缺点变化和深度，大大后期endless 模式有点无聊

不过底子很好,相信随着patch和fix以及DLC的推出会有所改善

35732502.review:
Not a bad addition to the series, but I think it takes as many steps back as it does forward. 

The UI is less intuitive, and things are hidden behind pages when they should be accessible from the main screen. This is mainly an issue of spells being too clumsy to use. The game could greatly benefit from a "Hot Bar", akin to WoW. 
Monster collection is just a pain in the rear, and the version in dungeons 2 is far superior as a way to collect critters. The new UI is too busy being pretty to be useful. It is entirely too damned large. 


The game style is a bit of a departure from previous titles. (to include dungeon keeper). There is now a resource which you must collect from the over-world, so the days of hiding behind a wall of traps is gone. Also, your units are a lot less micro-intensive, freely using their skills without having to be "activated". I think this is an over-all positive. 


The game is worth between 30-40 dollars, but if you have NOT played any of the previous titles, get dungeons2 instead. It is a slightly (ever so slightly) better game, for 1/4 of the price. Once done with that, if you want more, get this game.

35730995.review:
Self depricating humor, and a charming send up to both the genre of dungeon-building and fantasy in general. If you take your fantasy /very seriously/ and cannot stand LOTR or DnD or other fantasy tropes being poked fun at, then mute the sound and turn off subtitles. Else, become an assistant to the Doesn't-Really-Need-Your-Help Evil and enjoy it. 
Minor gripe; the tutorials are in a seperate area, and not part of the main quest line. If you need/want a refresher or instructions on how to play the mechanics of the game, do not set out to play without first going through the tutorials.
Extremely minor gripe; The research icon is dark, on dark background, in generally dark surroundings. Something to make it stand out, rather than looking like it might be greyed out might be worth looking into.

35729531.review:
Besser als Dungeons 2, weil mal wirklich die Schwachpunkte ausgemerzt wurden. Das neue Menü ist gewöhnungsbedürftig, aber trotzdem letztlich effektiver.
Man kann jetzt alle 3 Fraktionen im Dungeon haben und muss sich nicht mehr spezialisieren. Das ist nett, aber leider sieht der Dungeon jetzt nicht mehr unterschiedlich aus und die speziellen Anforderungen der Fraktionen sind jetzt hinfällig.
Schade! Das war doch taktisch schon vielfältiger. Gewöhnungsbedürftig ist zudem, dass Kisten gebaut und dann erst weiter erforscht und dann verarbeitet werden. Da muss man die Taktik umstellen. Aber wenigstens können das die Schnodderlinge machen. Somit fehlen keine Goblins beim Kampf und der Kistenbau wird nicht ständig unterbrochen, weil Schnodderlinge ja keine Bedürfnisse haben. Das macht es doch reichlich flüssiger im Dungeon.
Forschung findet jetzt zentral über Menü statt und nicht mehr in den einzelnen Räumen. Das spart viel Zeit und lustige Animationen gehen verloren. Aber dafür ist Forschung jetzt viel übersichtlicher. Ganz cool ist die Möglichkeit Helden einzusperren und zu übernehmen. Dadurch bekommt man (im besten Fall) die Stärken des Gegners für die eigenen Truppen. Sehr praktisch!
Humor ist - wie immer - reichlich vorhanden. Monty Arnold hat wieder richtig Laune, was erheblich zur Atmosphäre beiträgt. Die Anspielungen auf alle möglichen Spiele, Filme, Serien und Universen sind auf hohem Niveau, was sehr gefällt. Es lohnt sich sehr im Almanach nachzulesen, weil auch dort nicht nur viel erklärt, sondern auch viel Humor versteckt wird.
Wer das bei Dungeons 2 nicht mochte, wird es auch hier nicht mögen. Tipp: Lässt sich einfach abschalten.
Ich bereue den Kauf keine Minute. Mir gefällt es sehr.

Which means if you liked the old one, you will enjoy the sequel, if not, you have to look for something different.  
What I like best about Dungeons:
- the humour with its side blows to actual games, films/series, politics (e.g. Game of Thrones, Lord of the Rings, berlin airport)
- brilliant narrator who is very likely to compete with the one from "The Stanley parable"
- the core mechanic gameplay
- the little details (bavarian flag in the brewery!)

Give it a chance and have fun.

35727847.review:
Good Game, really, really great developers!

The bad:
- Dungeons 3 has, compared to Dungeons 2, less features, as others have already mentioned. This however has not affected the fun I had playing it.

- The voice acting of the narrator is great, but that of the main protagonist a bit weak, compared to Barthas of part 2.

- Apparently the tech-tree has to be re-researched from scratch  every single mission, which sucks a bit.

- Kalypso (the publisher, not the developer) has massive issues with responding to technical issues about the game. I have yet to receive anything more than a "ticket received" message following my bug report to them. (Edit from 20th October 2017: I received a standard Copy&Paste Text saying that I have the wrong Linux version. This despite me having explained them why it is not the case)

The good:
- Everything else pretty much: This game has of course lots of elements from Dungeon Keeper, but also quite a strong RPG and Tactical/RTS edge to it. You cannot just sit in your dungeon, you have to send out teams on the surface to reach your objectives. At most you can have 20 creatures (not counting workers and heroes/titans) at the same time, so the scale is not yet grand-strategy and closer to an RPG with a really large adventuring party. 

- Snots now move faster compared to D2, though they are still not gaining any XP

- Improved graphics compared to D2

The really great:

- The way the developers react to bad ratings (such as this one was in the past) and to bugs. Despite Kalypso's (the publisher) best effort to keep them isolated from complains and bugs, within only 2 days of me describing the crash issues I had on Linux they had prepared a patch. Before that (see the comments below) they had already responded to my criticism and promised a quick fix. I did not feel ignored as I sometimes do when complaining to developers of AAA-games. 

- Available on Linux from the start.




See below for my original negative rating:

Massive crash-issues under Linux. Game crashes again and again, without any error messages, forcing me to spam the quicksave function. 
This is similar to the issues that Dungeons II had, but which remain apparently not only unfixed (in Dungeon II) but have also been carried over to this game. Support was extremely unhelpful, refusing to forward my bug report to the developers out of hand.

(This is not an issue of bad hardware, my machine has an i7 6700, 32GB of Ram and a GTX 950 (4GB VRAM) as graphics chip)

35727544.review:
I quite enjoy this game. For those that have played dungeons 2, or dungeons keeper.. You would love this game. It has all the athetics that dungeons 2 had, plus a couple added features. There is now the ability to research things in a research tree! Plus a couple added resource gathering on both the dungeon and the outside world, I will leave you to find that one out :-).

For those that have not played this game
A synopsis of this series would be that you are a Dungeon Overlord (Supreme Evil) you control minons (worker units) by pointing your mighty evil hand on the rocks and click on them, eventually they will succomb to your will and dig out your dungeon. If they are not working fast enough BEAT THEM UP, i'm not joking give them a slap they will work harder for you XD.
- Your goal is to build the best dungeon that can defend against the adverntures and other forces. In the dungeons there 
   will be neutral enemies, allowing you to level up on them and gain a tomb of power to give one your army some type of 
   buff.
- Ocassionally or frequently (depending on the level) you will have enemies attack you from the "overworld" 
- You can build traps to kill adventures 
- Build rooms to fulfill your armies needs
- Build giant treasure rooms if that is your fancy

Pros:
 - Game is atheticly pleasing
 - When digging through a dungeon it is "new" every time
 - Envioronment looks great
 - Gameplay is fun
 - Narrator is hilarious and quirky
 - Campaign (so far) is very fun, will edit when finished
- The hero has a lot of good quirky lines that will make you cringe and laugh at the same time, but that is what most 
   players will come for, the humor of the commentary
- There is a good amount of dialog from the narrator and the hero

Cons:
 - No option to change in the graphics settings, no sliders just the ability to change resolution.
 - A.I. and units seem to have a little trouble with mapping where they are going so units placed in the back of the line 
   (such as healers and ranged units), sometimes move to the front line, causing them injury and a little more needed 
   micro, which is very managable.

Overall:
- This game is great, it feels like a very good addtiion to the series Dungeons: 1, 2
- If you enjoy Real Time Strategy as well as a kick a** story, then you would enjoy this game

35725082.review:
Pros: bit more specialisation in tactics, new variaty in dungeon functions, necromancy (every dark lord needs some undead at his disposal, right?

Cons: workers somewhat slow in gathering (mainlt little snots), no fighting stances in the overworld, humor a bit dull compared to dungeons 2 (especially main protagonist), forced to rush in campaign missions, buggy, micromanagement

6.5/10

- Review -

Let me first say I have played like 8 hours atm. The first thing to mention is, that the game still has a few bugs in gameplay. One of them gamebreaking, and had to start the mission over again. Furthermore music tends to sometimes mix up on places where it shouldn't (switching between dungeon and overworld uncorrupted land for instance)

So let's start for real now.

For those that are unfamiliar with this genre of game: dungeons is a so called 'dungeon master'. You play a evil lord that creates a dungeon for the heroes to storm in, and die in.

Now in comparison to dungeons 2, so far I can tell the dungeon functionalities have greatly improved. You have more dungeon rooms to experiment with, and healing has become available pretty soon from start. Furthermore has research become more organized in a handy menu.

The downside I so far have exprienced is only the micromanagement. Many traps are no longer automatic, and have to be manually activated, increasing the level of micromanagement. In combination with the time presure focused missions, this can pose a bit of a problem.

Overall I quite enjoyed the game so far, though it sometimes lacks the humor of the previous game. Giving this game a 6.5/10

35724440.review:
1.非常棒的一款游戏！模拟运营+即时战略，推荐这游戏的第一代挖矿和滴水的声效素材是神作！希望下一个代用上！
2.第三代旁白非常棒，贱贱的，让人愿意看过场动画。
3.打任务战役很容易就一个任务打上2小时，看着苦工挖矿发呆
4.自家怪物不练级到满级不愿出去浪这点有多少人跟我一样呢。。。
5.即时战略那块想起魔兽争霸流行那会了，3线操作的我果然已经老了。。。
6.以上感兴趣的人强烈推荐购买，反正2小时退款如果稍微入迷你也来不及了哈哈哈~~~~


7.对了，如果报错退出或无响应，要关掉所有安全软件杀毒软件，这个是跟这公司最新用的UT引擎控件有关系，我遇到后全关裸跑4小时没再出现了。


8.邪恶值需要出去地面打小地图像祭坛一样的东西
9.紫色魔力值，战役任务是要打地面上像灯塔的东西（过场动画说封印的那个），之后挖紫矿或恶魔龙去摸建造的水晶塔即可。

35724154.review:
This game is my first foray into the Dungeon Keeper style games.  I've played plenty management sims, but the closest game I've played to this is Evil Genius.

Overall?  9/10  The game is a lot of fun.  There is a wide variety of traps, research oppotrunities, and unit combinations you can try and explore.  While you are very restricted in the first few campaign missions, after a while, you are able to attack problems in a variety of manners.

My only real problem with the game is that the game doesn't teach you (or doesn't have) some valuable interface options when designing your dungeon.  For example, I don't know how to rotate traps that go on walls--I have to simply mouse over the same corner over and over until, by luck, the wall trap aligns with the wall I want.  My current solution is to avoid wall-based traps.  This alignment problem comes up in the context of structures that you place in rooms as well--I have to jiggle my mouse and hope to get lucky.  This seems like something that can be easily fixed in an upcoming patch.

There is another issue.  The game doesn't do a very good job of explaning things.  Perhaps the Alamanc could be updated with more information?

35723531.review:
Overall there are many improvements in Dungeons 3 from Dungeons 2 and enough differences to make it stand out on its own.

The branching system of researching the Undead, Horde, and Demon styles is an interesting concept, but heavily restricts basic things from Dungeons 2 like traps or spells, putting them at the back of their respective trees. It also features a simpler unit roster than Dungeons 2, but hopefully this will end up being expanded on as they release DLC/Expansions.

I can't say that I was impressed by the compettetive multiplayer, as it only gives an option of accruing Evilness and not an option to invade and destroy your opponent as there existed in Dungeons 2.

The graphics are more updated than Dungeons 2 (which is to be expected) and could be called all things nice and pretty, but of course describing them as such would be an affront to the game and all things evil and malign.

In short, it is a good game, but feels like it needs more to be rounded out.

35722672.review:
Поиграл так немного. Я был в восторге, ибо я сам по себе негодяй и всегда мечтал управлять армией существ (демоны, нежить и... Орда? Отсылка к ВоВ? Ну, всё равно не плохо). Правда есть всё таки куча недочётов, согласитесь? К примеру деревянная армия. Хотелось бы увидеть немного больше повседневной жизни своих подчинённых, когда они отдыхают и гуляют по моему царству под землёй. Ну, не знаю... Добавте побольше вещей, с которыми бы взаимодействовали, или добавте побольше эмоций у них. Ну вы меня поняли.
  Потом склеп... 2 отряда зомби есть, 2 отряда скелетов лучников есть, герои служащие мне верой и правдой, под страхом моей огромной латной рукавицы есть. А что делать с остальной сотней живых? Серьёзно, у меня набиралось под сотню глупых людей и я понятия не имел что с ними делать. Добавте пожалуйста ещё какую нибудь механнику с ними. К примеру девушек в рабство брать, а остальных там... В мясорубку на котлеты пускать. Или уберите лемит зомбей и лучников, но что бы воскрешатся не могли, а лв будет их соответствовать с рангом умершего героя. Ну или можно было бы их выпускать на арену к орде, что бы они там их разрубали на кусочки. И всё же придумайте какую нибудь переработку для лишних трупов. 
  А ещё хотелось бы ЕЩЁ ВСЕГО ПОБОЛЬШЕ. Улучшений, существ, интересной механики, что бы невозможно было заскучать.
  Кстати, насчёт улучшений и всего побольше. Было бы не плохо иметь в арсенале побольше классных заклинаний, к примеру какого нибудь контроля, порабощения и т.д., и 1 маленький ниуансик по поводу улучшения соплей, а именно их телепортацию. Ни анимации, ничего. Они просто появляются внезапно у цели как какой нибудь двадцать пятый кадр или скример. Пожалуйста, поставте какую нибудь магическую тучку когда они перемещаются.
  И подошёл я сейчас к боёвке... Скудненько немного. Понаставил ловушей, в одну линию, и сидишь, наблюдаешь как они подыхают, и если кто выжил, твои поданные прибегают и добивают. Не хватает компьютерного интелекта. К примеру попробовал не в линию , а с разветлениями. В общем, все идут только к ристаллу. Грустно. 
  В ОБЩЕМ! Игрушка довольно не плоха, хорошо озвучина (До одури шедеврально озвучина! Тебе и чёрный юмор целый колодец, и отсылок целая цестерна, а что насчёт самого сюжета... Маразм, в хорошем смысле, такой, что не только деревья гнутся, даже горы плавятся, и полностью сломанная четвёртая стена.) В неё, хотя бы ради сюжета и угара стоит. Ну а что насчёт геймплея, и взаимодействущей составляющей- не плох, НО не больше и не меньше, просто не плох. Так что я надеюсь что меня разработчики услышат, и не только меня, а ещё тек, у кого тоже есть такие-же мысли как у меня или даже лучше, и доведут игру до совершенства. Мы все, своими чёрными сердцами надеимся на вас!

35719971.review:
OUI et NON

Alors je vais faire mon raleur, je sais...
Quand j'ai découvert Dungeons 2 c'était le coup de coeur. Un jeu bien drôle et pas prise de tête. Tu jouais et voila, un bon moment de passé même si c'était trop facile. Mais défoncer du gentil gentillement et simplement je trouvais le concept jouissif...puis Dungeons 3 est arrivé... la deception.

Il faudra me dire POURQUOi vous avez décidé de changer l'interface (la partie où on peut construire des nouveaux batiments, détruire des constructions, les améliorations et reboucher avec la terre)... c'est quoi ce délire de foutre ca a gauche en dépliant ?
C'est IMMONDE et pas du tout pratique surtout quand le menu prend TOUT TON ECRAN et que le jeu, lui bien sur, continu à jouer... mais WTF. L'avantage de l'interface du 2 était simple et au moins on pouvait voir ce qui se passe dans ton donjon.

Concernant les graphisme ba y a rien a dire, c'est beau.

Le systeme de malveillance où faut bouger son cul à la surface pour la chopper est C"""" C""""""", si tu n'en a pas tu es litteralement bloqué pour développer ton donjon...
Certains me diront que c'est pour éviter de camper dans ton donjon, que ce soit un peu plus actif au niveau jeu... moi je trouve ca chiant.

Concernant les escarmouches et le jeu... y a aucune destructions d'environnement, tu tue trois mecs sans savoir qu'ils sont les bossent de la map et hop fin du game alors qu'il restait encore toute la map à conquérir... la déception. Tu te fait c"""" pour développer ton donjon et puis non en fait.

Sinon niveau campagne ca va, c'est comme avant et donc cool.

35718805.review:
Если кратко: Игра не стоит ни своих денег, ни потраченого на него времни.
А если не кратко, то вот что я думаю

 Абсолютно несбалансированный геймплей - Если вы включили режим Битва, то лучше вам блять блицом собрать минимальную орду и отправится ломать постройки врагов. В противном же случае, если вы вдруг заходите поиграть все таки в ПОДЗЕМЕЛЬЕ ( игра так и называется, и вроде подразумевает что в подземелье вы и должны играть ) то после 3-4 волны, игра начнет рвать вам жопу так, что она будет у вас красная как у самки бабуина. И не дай бог вы построите Склеп! Просто не дай бог!
После адского рейда героев, когда у вас выживет только один гребанный гоблин, ваш склеп переполнится трупами ваших прислужников. Воскрешение на каждого занимает уйму времени и ресурсов. А когда ваша кристалл будет под атакой, то нежить которая занимается воскрешением вашей орды, просто убежит защищать его. И все бы нечего, но тогда прогресс воскрешения монстра обнуляется. И вы попадаете в замкнутый круг. Вы скажите, "нехер орду терять!" Но вы ее в любом случае потеряете, если будите просто играть в подземелье, если вы ее потеряли, и у вас при этом склеп, то вам пиздец. Ах да... Удалить/убить/уволить монстра нельзя во время склепа, он все равно будет занимать у вас единицу жителя подземелья. Даже если мертвый. И поэтому вы не можете нанять новых.
 Неинтересно играть - Что монстры, что герои, это просто сухой скрипт. Абсолютно не вижу смысла добавлять было в игру какие то социальные постройки, по типу пивоварни. За монстрами не интересно наблюдать, они либо спят, либо едят, больше они ничего не делают. Тоже самое с героями, они не исследуют подземелье , они просто идут к кристаллу (ядру) и ломают его. Лежит ли рядом золото или какой то лут, они не обращают на него внимания, они просто скрипт сломать кристалл. 

Я абсолютно не понимаю  почему столько положительных отзывов. Игра сделана халтурно, море багов, недочетов. А чего стоит когда музыка накладывается друг на друга, и в ушах звучит какафония. Удивительно то , как много добавили разработчики в третью часть, и при этом умудриться сделать ее настолько скучной. С таким ценником, я как нормальный человек, жду качества от игры, или хотя бы что бы она была интересна. Мало того что не интересно, так графика 2010 года. 

Не рекомендую.

35718791.review: 玩这款游戏让我有种玩《魔兽3》的熟悉感，非常棒的画面，旁白，汉化（汉化质量非常高，点赞一个）等等。但也有一些个人觉得需要改进的地方。比如说，游戏画面的流畅度明显不如《魔兽3》，有轻微的卡顿。其次因为建造栏在屏幕的左边，用鼠标点的时候容易造成画面移动。再一个就是军队，分不清哪个兵是在地表，哪个兵是在地下。军队没有编队功能，能让人微操的空间不大，而且AI不够，敌人来打基地的时候，还得一个一个去抓兵扔过去。想吐槽的都说完了。总的来说这款游戏是个好游戏，支持开发者，希望游戏越做越好。

35717210.review:
犹豫了半天还是给个好评了，其实我是想给个中评的，前面两作没有玩过，但是本作我认为这是一个非常不像地牢类游戏的地牢游戏。（好的部分其他人都说了，我就来提提意见吧~）

这游戏像是把RTS类型加地牢类型强行拼接出来的二合一游戏，地上就变成了RTS的操作，还能对小兵进行微操，但是回到地牢中，单位却又变成了不可控的。这让人感觉像是在玩两个游戏，毕竟操作方式都不是一贯性的，就很匪夷所思。

先说主战役，虽然我只打了前面几关，但是感觉就像在打魔兽争霸的战役一样。根本没有地牢的感觉，直接一波爆兵冲掉几个任务据点就行了，哪怕家里来人快爆了，只要先干死敌人据点就行了...恩...没看错啊...这游戏是叫地牢3啊......

然后再说无限模式，就是遭遇战，这总算有点地牢的感觉了，总算有守家的必要了！但是...怎么房间都是兵营的效果？结果人来了还是一堆小兵A上去......

而且蛋疼的是，升级兵种的资源的产出建筑是占领地面的敌人据点之后才能持续产出的，但是地面并不能进行防守（[spoiler]所以多融合个TD的要素不行吗？让我在地面建几座塔也好啊[/spoiler]），而且还会定期有人类来攻击这个据点，于是导致整个游戏分成了两个战场（地面和地牢），这确实是一种创新，但同时也分散了游戏的关注点，何况冒险者方面的话直接在地面靠微操就挡住了，试问还要你地牢何用？那这还是地牢游戏吗？

地牢方面就更神奇了，作为一个地牢，一个防御性的迷宫一样的存在，然而大部分的房间居然都只是兵营的作用，甚至大部分的时间都是靠小兵直接A上去，而且这些小兵还能去地表直接截留敌人，地牢几乎失去了作为地牢的价值了，然后经过了漫长的升级过程，终于可以做陷阱了！但是问题又来了...这个花费，而且不光材料需要生产，陷阱本身居然也需要小兵生产...做半天才做一两个陷阱还不如专心升级小兵和英雄来的快......

总之，如果这是一款RTS游戏的话（[spoiler]我压根也不会买了[/spoiler]）那可能还说的过去，然而现阶段我看到是一个在地下做兵营的RTS游戏，不过好在游戏刚出来，还有后续的更新（[spoiler]只要别像某城市帝国一样跑路就好了,所以都不敢给差评，看到轻语代理我都有点怕了......[/spoiler]），创新是好的，但是请不要忘记了游戏类型的本质是什么样的。先就这样吧，看后续了。

35716144.review:
Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GDrr6qB8SLY

Having played Dungeon Keeper 2 for over a decade I was excited when I discovered this series last week. Is it a clone of DK2? No, this game adds a more robust RTS system for above ground combat to form a real hybrid of building simulation and RTS. The problem with hybrids is they rarely excel at either task, and there's no exception here. 
 
On the RTS side it looks like a real RTS. One can form unit groups with ctrl+[num], use unit abilites and individually micro units. However it's just a nice facade, there is no enemy opponent trying to counter play or win for themselves. Just sporadic spawned waves of enemies. There is also no balance or challenge in the game, when one can beat the maximum difficulty with just 6 starter units. For those looking for an actual RTS this game is not for you *cough ☆craft*

For the simulation side it is close to the Dungeon Keeper this game is 'inspired' from. However they have not added some of the more fun aspects, such as viewing your dungeon though the eyes of your minions. Also when dropping units on an object they will on occasion not interact with it. Such as dropping a unit on a chicken and the unit just stands there complaining it's hungry. Picking up the unit and dropping it again usually gets it to eat, this can get vexing over time.   

If you read this far you might be wondering why I recommended the game. Because despite it's flaws I still found the game fun, and that's what really matters. At half the price of a AAA game it's also decent value too so if you're looking for something different then have a try you might be suprised.

35714381.review:
简体中文翻译的非常到位，地图里有很多彩蛋（比如地精总统山）。旁白非常出彩，各种吐槽，吐槽主角养父贼鸡儿烦，吐槽主角双重人格很好笑等等等等，反正一进游戏，就会被旁白的魅力吸引。
游戏性方面还不错，就我目前的进度来看，玩起来的感觉和war3特别像，简单模式用鼠标点就能随便通关。但是如果地狱模式，就必须记快捷键和编队了。
在地下世界，也就是玩家的基地，开局对基地的规划很重要（建筑学）。哪里放床哪里养鸡哪里修工厂最后好都是开局就定好大体位置，不然到后期需要翻地重建，很麻烦。
总体打法和魔兽差不多，开局先造满农民，英雄带一点兵出门清小野（黄色球矿），然后稳定发展就基本拿下了。记得出门家里留兵（t 奶 地精各一个就行），兵没血了往后拉一下仇恨就转移了。英雄的魔法与技能很强力。
总体来说，这款游戏适合喜欢rts或者地牢类游戏的玩家。（真的很休闲的游戏，听旁边扯淡其乐无穷）

10-22更新。怠惰的我到今天才正式主线通关，总体来说难度适中，其中星战梗特别多，作为星战迷得我可以说是很开心了。

35713019.review: Что я могу сказать? Я полюбила вашу серию игр ещё со второй части (первую пока не пробывала, но обязательно это исправлю). Сюжет проходится весело, а теперь, когда ещё и мультиплеер завезли, так и вовсе красота. Реплики рассказчика не надоедают, только Талия немного сдаёт в начале. Немного печалит, что кажись случилось глобальное вымирание и пропали наги-медузы, тролли, носферату и добрая часть прочих существ. Однако в остальном всё, без сомнения лучше, особенно радует то, что все расы теперь вместе сеют хаос и разрушения. Ловушки, прибавили в весе и , если раньше от них была сомнительная польза(исключение валуны и прочие высокоуровневые) , правда теперь их менять морока страшная, ибо сопляки на сей факт, что их прочность исчерпана редко обращают внимание.

35709920.review:
Who needs therapy when you can kill absolutely everything and smack the snot out of your, er, little snotts.... 

Snarking back and forth with in-game characters, a little 4th-wall-breaking and some droll sarcasam gives the sense of writing ala Terry Pratchett and Neil Gaiman - Down right lovely and only enhanced by the return of our favorite Narrator (Please Kevan, never leave the series).

While the graphics have been enhanced slightly, the same design charm and art direction have been maintained from past iterations. UI and UX improvements have been made, however, I can't say that I am a fan of the side bar menu (sorry, guys, it's lovely - it's just not my cup of tea) interrupting game play to issue orders etc feels very disruptive and I had to admit that I didn't find the click to reveal intitive - I spent the first five minutes looking for my build menu.

Two missions in, it's clear that the mission length and to-do lists have been massively improved, adding hours of playability. 

Overall, the charm and twee cuteness have endured and suffieciently enough to give all fans of the series something to enjoy in one form or another. 
Love this game, love the Devs and well done to the team at RealmForge.

早上4点起床下载了 玩了4个小时 体验很糟心
能感受到游戏想把操作简化 ，
但RTS复杂的攀升系统加上，魔法、复活、陷阱、英雄、据点、建造、操作的一系列模拟经营概念反而更加混乱，
战斗节奏非常败笔，拖拉的让我感觉像个控制了一堆残疾人，小兵拉扯聚团后也第一时间拉不开，
尤其是双地图的感觉更是差劲。
自己家的时候满地图找兵，噢，你说f2，那我家里固定留一到两个造陷阱的兵呢，
再重复框内点击2个留下，以及前站的2个，废操作不是很多余？
打个剧情，抢地面灵魂资源点，我基本已经看到游戏全面貌。
【我感受不到RTS战斗场面的恢弘爽快，被两个地图的手动切换搞得没半点脾气，游戏也没提示我有切换两个地图的快捷键】
旁白取巧但不能改变游戏本身素质，地下城当模拟经营你还要出兵去当RTS来打。
剧情没什么好说，就这样吧，休闲模式的剧情打着（伪）硬核游戏的玩法。
我没玩过1、2代，无法跟上面几代比较。

因为创意、官中给了好评。

就这样 满分十分，我打6分，看后续更新了。

35703606.review:
Ich muss sagen Dungeons 3 gefällt mir genauso gut wie der 2te Teil! Die Witze sind wie immer super und die Story ist für ein Tower Defence game sogar zeimlich gut. 
Ich persönlich vermisse das Upgrade System der Einheiten aus Dungeons 2 sehr, kann aber auch verstehen wieso es rausgelassen wurde. 
Da man in Dungeons 3 alle Böse Fraktionen (Horde, Dämonen und Untote) auf einmal spielt, gäbe es mit dem Upgraden zu viele Einheiten die einem zur Auswahl stehen. 
Dies würde dann wieder das Balancing zerstören, da die meisten der letzen Stufen von den Einheiten aus Dungeons 2 wirklich sehr stark sind und dann in Kombination mit den anderen Fraktionen fast schon OP wären. 
Dafür gibt es in Dungeons 3 widerum die neuen und starken Helden die man sich besorgen kann. 

Dann muss ich noch sagen das mir Dungeons 3 etwas leichter erscheint als Dungeons 2, was aber durch den optionalen "Höllisch Modus" föllig in Ordnung ist. (was aber nichts heißen muss da ich gerade mal vor der Stahlschmiede stehe und somit nicht sagen kann wie schwer es später wird)

Die einzigartigen Zauber die man in machen Missionen bekommt wie z.B. die Zombie Horde auf Grimli loslassen sind super und werden hoffentlich auch in den weiteren Missionen vorkommen.

Und daher lege ich Dungeons 3, allen die Dungeons 2 und Tower Defence Spiele mit Humor mögen ans Herz.

35703196.review:
Dungeons 3 eh ? .... where shall we start. 8/10

WHAT IS DUNGEONS 3

Dungeons 3 is a strategy game inspired by the cult classic dungeon keeper franchise by bullfrog (RIP Bullfrog).

The game takes some classic gameplay from dungeon keeper such as digging out your dungeon, building rooms, gathering \ training your minions and finally laying traps for those pesky hero's. It also becomes its own game adding the overworld combat that was teased for Dungeon keeper 3. When in the overworld your armies take on a totaly new role where the games goes from a dungeon keeper style game too a sort of warcraft 3 style game where you can micro your minions activate there abilities and so on.

If you want a more true to the original game I could not recomend a game called "war for the overworld" any more both are wonderfull games. You can find "War for the Overworld* here : 

http://store.steampowered.com/app/230190/War_for_the_Overworld/



Now back to Dungeons 3 ....



THE PRO'S

The game feels true enough to the dungeon keeper series too scratch that itch for keeper fans but also its different enough to be its own game and a new experience. 

The game has a great sense of humor and lots of refrences that makes me cackle.

The variety from the underworld to the overworld helps keep the gameplay fresh. You can spend a long time building up your lair, go for a walk for a change of pace then spend the next half hour useing traps to kill of those invading hero's 

Graphics are quite nice + go well with the not taking its self serious feel of the game.

Gameplay is basic enough to pick up fast but complicated enough to give depth. For example you can just yolo charge your army or you can move your minions around to avoid damage, toggle and activate abilities focus healers and the list goes on and on and those where for just a small combat in the overworld. 

The research tree is easy to understand and quite fun with enough areas to spec into to give you quite a bit of variety and playstyles. The resources needed to advance your research also forced you to advance in the overworld not just the underworld so you cant just build up then steamrole. as someone who often does build up and steam role i am glad its not the best option as it breaks up the gameplay and helps everything feel fresh. 

The User interface ( for most of the game ) is very well done and easy to understand. 


THE CON'S


The in-level user interface menu on the left side of the screen is a wee bit annoying and takes some time getting used too. It took me a long time too stop summoning new minions when i was trying to select ones I already had. The tab for your army is also not bad when you do not have too many minions but as soon as you have more than 5 it becomes hard too organise clustered and a pain in the backside to find the minion you want and impossible to do so with any speed. 

I miss portals spawning minions.



THE END



Thanks for your time reading this and i hope it helped you make up your mind if you wanted to purchase the game :)

If you want to see some gameplay you can find my video here :
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SgFksUOETnM

or my channel here : 
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEWi55_w4pBFCy06QGTdOBw

35703156.review:
Dungeons III améliore par petites touches l’expérience que pouvait offrir son prédécesseur. Son humour et sa partie gestion offrent de bons moments qui feront plaisir aux premiers fans de Dungeon Keeper, malgré l’absence d’éclat de génie, se contentant de réutiliser la formule. La partie RTS donne la bonne impression de répandre la mort et la destruction sur le monde extérieur sans pour autant être très pointue. Combinés, les deux aspects corrects du jeu en font un mariage plus que correct. Malheureusement, l’interface console et le rythme tranché à la hache d’orc en font un jeu inégal qui ne demande pourtant qu’à vous plaire. Si vous avez toujours rêvé de jouer dans l’autre camp, que les paladins loyal-con vous ont toujours exaspéré et que vous êtes actuellement en manque de jeu de stratégie, Dungeons III peut tout de même être un bon choix.

Reste de la critique sur [url=https://www.warlegend.net/test-dungeons-3/]WarLegend.net[/url]

35702481.review:
Dungeons 3 setzt die geschichte aus Dungeons 2 mit dem gewohnten Humor fort. Im 3. teil wird sich weiter dem Großen vorbild genährt, auch wenn Dungeon Keeper 1 noch nicht Erreicht wird.

Neues:
Einige neue Räume wie: Verstecke, Gefängniss, Folt... Überedungskammer.
Neue Mechaniken wie ... Ja Gefangennahme, Schlafbedürfniss und Fol... Überredung
Keine "Handgemachten" Gefechts karten mehr, sondern Zufalls Karten


Änderungen:
Wo man im 2. Teil eine von 3 (Mit DLC) Fraktionen mit je 12 Kreaturentypen, die sich aber in Fähigkeiten teilweise ähnelten, kontrolierte sind diese im 3. Teil zu einer Fraktion zusammen gefasst, die zwar "nur" über 12 bzw mit upgrades über 14 typen verfügt, die aber durch gefolt ... Überredete Helden alles benötigte abdecken. Die Horden Kreaturen wurden dadurch geschwächt das die Wiederbelebung nicht mehr im Gestrichenen Lazaret (Heilung erfolgt jetzt im Versteck), sondern in einem "neuen"(er ersetzt quasi das Halbe Lazaret) Untotenraum Wiederbelebt werden. 
Auch wenn die veringerung auf 14 (Von 32) erstmal nicht gut klingt muss man dazu erstmal wissen das viele Kreaturen Doppelt waren, und andere nur in der Kampangne Wirklich sinn gemacht haben. Dazu war das alte  System etwas Kompliziert, so das ich diese neuerung begrüße, vorallem da man Helden durch Folte ... Überedung auf seine Seite bringen kann. Negativ finde ich hier das diese, dann auf eine grundklasse gesetzt werden, und nich ihren typ Beibehalten.

Geändert wurde auch die Forschung, die jetzt in einem eigen menü stattfindet, und nicht mehr in den Räumen in auftrag gegeben werden muss. Ob man hier auch die "Besetztung" hätte rausnehmen müssen kann Diskutiert werden Beschleunigt aber den Spielfluss.

Humor:
Wie im 2. Teil wird das Fantasy genre heftig durch den Kakau gezogen. Von Vampires 2 über Monty Python bis Herr der Ringe und Star Wars ist alles dabei. Besonders Herr der ringe bekommt sein Fett weg.

Grafik
Schaut euch Videos und Screens an und macht euch ein eigenes Bild mir gefälts.

Fazit
Tja ich Bereue den kauf nicht. Das einziege was mir etwas sauer aufstößt ist das ende der Kampangne, das zwar nicht so deutlich wie im 2. teil, mehr als nur eine andeutung auf ein kommendes Story DLC ist, auch wenn im gegensatz zum 2. die Story Durchaus Abgeschlossen ist, ist das "Fortsetzung Folgt" sehr deutlich angedeutet.

Auch wer Dungeons 1 nicht mochte kann in 2 und 3 Durchaus Glücklich werden, da diese spiele ein Völlig anderes Spielprinziep verfolgen. Dungeons ist eines der seltenden beispiele, wo Gravierende änderungen im Spielverlauf erfolgreich waren.

Von mir nen Daumen Hoch

35701472.review:
I have been a fan of this genre from Dungeon Keeper 2 back in the day, and I can say that I thouroughly enjoy this iteration.  After the opening hours of the game, here are my initial impressions, pros and cons:
Pros:
Excellent writing and storytelling.  A self-aware commentary both on this particular series, and on fantasy games as a whole.
Great atmosphere and sound design.  It is both obvious and enjoyable to look at the evil dungeons as opposed to the good overworld.
The research tracks have greatly improved the sense of progression, and invests the player more in improving their dungeon.
Overall an homage and improvement to the original Dungeon Keeper series, much more so than previous iterations.

Cons:
Still a lackluster strategy game given the limited tactical controls and options.  While the dungeon building is the main focus, the overworld strategy game is a bit light, but a welcome addition to the series.
Some frustration at the dungeon building stage in balancing creature needs.

As mentioned, these are initial impressions and may change after a full playthrough.  For now, I definately reccomend the game for people who enjoy being evil, and those who have fond memories of the original Dungeon Keeper 2, a true homage to what Dungeon Keeper 3 could have been.

35701204.review:
То же самое, что и Dungeons 2, только лучше. 

Чем лучше:

1)	Теперь армии никто не делит - за орков, демонов и нежить можно играть сразу же и на одной карте.
2)	Генерация уровней. Она, конечно, бесполезная, но заранее распланировать куда копать нельзя.
3)	Потрясный, смешной сюжет.  Ни в коем случае не пропускайте обучение, там вы сможете забавы ради убить разработчиков игры.
4)	Полная русская озвучка, в которой нашлось место как отличному закадровому голосу, так и чисто русскому юмору. Будут приколы и про «Держитесь там», и строительство Зенит-Арены.

Чем хуже:

1)	Кривой интерфейс у всплывающего меню, что занимает полэкрана, и из-за которого приходится долго вызывать нужные действия. Кто вообще догадался магию, ловушки, строительство, выбор армии и крафт армии засунуть в одно меню?
2)	Куда-то пропали веселые подземелья с квестами;
3)	Иногда разные музыкальные дорожки начинают играть одновременно. Надеюсь пофиксят.

Если понравилась вторая игра, то не пропускайте третью. 

Это все так же весело.

Это все тот же Dungeon Keeper 3, которого не было.

35696417.review:
Its always great to be evil. Especially when its a diabolical cliche of evil tropes done right. So gather those troops and kill, capture, control an rule over the lands!

Video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2Mjhad7SPJk

Text:
Visually a great looking game, its strongest suite is the clarify of the visuals coupled with the amazing voice over work. Each part and piece of the game is a gem in fantastic over the top EVILNESS. From smacking goblins snoring trolls, each part is well put together and enjoyable to look and mess about with.

Building the dungeon is excellent and has all the flavor we've come to love. Between interplay between buildings and a diverse tech tree that has a lot of choice (especially with the scrolls unlocked later that allow further research). Coupled with the overworld you end up with a nice large playfield to build, expand and pillage.

Sadly, the overworld is a little bit of a letdown - with the biggest focus of the overworld being combat as you send your armies forth, it gets pulled down by the games biggest flaw: The combat system. 

Combat is mostly you running over your enemies or being bogged down by annoying pathing issues if you don't. And if on some magical occasion your pathing works with you, your minions as well as the AI are about as smart as two bricks glued to the back of a donkey. Honestly, i mostly just started rolling with a massive steamroller and forgot about tactics entirely, simply because using tactics in combat just made me cry.


That said, the game is full of content and sports even a co-op mode - which is lovely to have. Between a good (if predictable) campaign, solid skirmish and multiplayer it has a lot to offer.

So if you dont want to spend all your time fighting, and enjoy the fun of building a fancy trap filled death dungeon this might be one to pick up.


If you enjoy the review - [url=http://store.steampowered.com/curator/11617580/]do follow my curator feed![/url]. Or check out the various other reviews on [url=https://youtube.com/c/guylogicgaming] YouTube[/url].

35696398.review:
Featuring a campaign that has a lot of the same hit-or-miss (mostly miss) humor as before, the game thankfully introduces random skirmish maps that can be used offline or online for vastly increased replay value. In addition, the interface is improved with an actual mouse pointer and better unit selection. The gameplay structure is the same as before: find the gold nuggets, place rooms to house units and produce resources, hire new units, and place defenses. However, new to the game is a research tree, which uses evil points accumulated by capturing locations on the Overworld map, forcing you to venture out of the dungeon in order to unlock the more advanced dungeon options required to win each scenario. While the flow of each game is the same, the random maps help immensely in creating a slightly different feel each time. The newest entry in the Dungeons series fixes the major problems from the last iteration by adding in random maps and improving the interface, finally making it a compelling management game.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZaG3x5R3kyU

35696664.review:
Video showing off a later level of the campaign: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TYvQQiV8D9w

Dungeons 3 is Dungeons 2 with improvements. Just like in 2, you are managing and defending a dungeon while preparing an army to take over the overworld. The humor and voice work is very much the same as 2. The gameplay has been improved and streamlined for a better experience since 2. If you loved 2, you will love 3.

As a sequel, it builds on everything that made 2 great and improves on it. You have even more monsters to play with, your dungeon looks really cool, and mechanics from the 2nd game are better refined.

Dungeons has a unique charm about it that is cheesy, but enjoyable.

There's a cool new feature where you can co-op the campaign. I didn't get a chance to try it, but the idea sounds cool.

I enjoyed the game, so I recommend it.
